story:
From the magazines to Instagram, more and more photographers are using smartphones as their primary cameras. And with good reason: today's smartphone cameras really are that awesome. Problem is, phones are made for the mass public, and so, they’re limited on the advanced features that give you more control.

Pictar Pro bridges the gap between a phone's power and camera's usability with a wide set of physical controls and software features. The cherry on top is the phenomenal user experience: a pleasure-to-touch polished metal grip and an unmatched front-loaded intuitive user interface.

It all started from the simple concept of adding expanded functionality along with a camera-like grip to smartphones.

On the Pictar Pro, we took things up a few notches. We designed it using only the most premium materials we could find, and added lots of feature requests we received from the community. And then we added a little battery boost too.

We can't say it enough- you have an awesome camera that you're using to take pictures of food, but your same smartphone camera was likely used to capture shots for National Geographic and Vogue in the past year. 

You already have all the components and megapixels you can possibly need, now add a robust tool to use 'em the right way.

When attached to Pictar Pro’s body, the foldable silicon viewfinder enables you to preview images and videos in full vivid detail- even under the brightest lights. Like when you’re outdoors on a sunny afternoon.

The screen adapts automatically, shrinking to the viewfinder’s window as soon as it’s snapped on to its designated slot.

Utilizing a seamless modern pairing connection technology, Pictar Pro pairs with your smartphone instantly via sound-waves, with no physical or Bluetooth connection necessary. 

iPhone 6, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6+, iPhone 6s+, iPhone 7, iPhone 7+, iPhone 8, iPhone 8+, iPhone X, iPhone Xs, iPhone Xs Max, iPhone Xr

 Samsung Galaxy S10, Samsung Galaxy S10+, Samsung Galaxy S10e, Samsung Galaxy A9(2016), Samsung Galaxy A9 Pro, Samsung Galaxy A8(2018), Samsung Galaxy A8+(2018), Samsung Galaxy A5, Samsung Galaxy S7, Samsung Galaxy S8, Samsung Galaxy S9, Samsung Galaxy S8 active, Samsung Galaxy S7 active, Samsung Galaxy S6 active, Samsung galaxy s6 edge, Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge+, Samsung galaxy note edge, Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge, Samsung Galaxy Note Fan Edition, Samsung galaxy Note 9, Samsung galaxy note 8, Samsung galaxy note 7, Samsung galaxy s6, Samsung Galaxy S8+, Samsung Galaxy S9+ 

Sony R1 Plus, Sony XZ1, Sony XA1 Plus, Sony L1, Sony XZs, Sony XA1 Ultra, Sony XZ, Sony XA Ultra, Sony Z5 Premium, Sony Z5, Sony M5, Sony Z3+, Sony Xperia R1 Plus, Sony Xperia XZ1, Sony Xperia XA1 Plus,  Sony Xperia L1, Sony Xperia XZs, Sony Xperia XA1 Ultra, Sony Xperia XA1, Sony Xperia XZ, Sony Xperia E5, Sony Xperia XA Ultra, Sony Xperia X, Sony Xperia Z5 Premiun, Sony Xperia Z5, Sony Xperia M5, Sony Xperia Z3+, Sony Xperia XA2, Sony Xperia XA2 Plus, Sony Xperia XA2 Ultra 

Huawei P20 lite, Huawei P9 lite mini, Huawei P10, Huawei P10 Lite, Huawei P8 Lite (2017), Huawei P8 Lite (2015), Huawei P9 Lite, Huawei mate 9, Huawei mate 10 pro, Huawei mate 10, Huawei mate 10 Lite, Huawei mate 9 pro, Huawei mate 8, Huawei Mate RS Porsche Design, Huawei P20, Huawei P9, Huawei P9 plus, Huawei P10 plus, Huawei P8, Huawei P20 Pro, Huawei Honor 7A, Huawei Y6, Huawei Y9 

Google Pixel, Google Pixel XL, Google Pixel 2, Google Pixel 2 XL, GooglePixel 3, Google Pixel 3 XL

We’re a team of obsessed makers for photography and proud Kickstarters. 

We’ve dedicated the last 5 years to developing and selling bags, cases, gadgets, and accessories to help photographers and videographers take their work to the next level.

The Pictar Pro is the improved premium version of our bestselling Pictar, which was successfully funded on Kickstarter and delivered to all our backers in early 2017. We took your feedback, added some ideas of our own, and developed the Pictar Pro.

story:
Summary

On September 6th, all of my photography equipment was stolen while I was attending a local festival in Landstuhl, Germany. My hope is that once I retire from the military, that I could do photography as a secondary career. Currently, photography is just a big hobby for me that I enjoy doing for myself and for my friends. Fortunately, most of my equipment is covered under my insurance policy; however, $750 of it is not covered because I did not have enough coverage for items that actually went up in value (significantly).

What I Need

$750 to cover my losses from my theft. The original equipment cost for my gear is around $12,000. $250 of the $750 is for the deductible and the other $500 is for the cost that isn't being covered by my insurance company.

story:
Up until now, there have only been two types of stabilizers on the market: classic counter-weighted mechanical and motorized brushless gimbals. With SteadyCross we're introducing a new category: Magnetic Camera Stabilizer.

Compared to traditional mechanical stabilizers, SteadyCross is an extremely easy to use piece of equipment - there is no need for extensive training. It is basically a point-and-shoot device: just follow your target and the rig will take care of the rest, while the twin-grip design makes sure you won't be straining your arms.

Having no electronics means you can rely on it under any circumstance, it can never die on you. In addition, brushless gimbals tend to add a certain robotic feel to your shots, while SteadyCross - being an analog device - gives you natural movements and total control.

Potato Jet: "Is this the future of camera stabilization?"

Armando Ferreira: "It's actually way better than a steadycam!"

Brandon Washington: "SteadyCross Shocked Me!"

SteadyCross is the first 3-axis gimbal which uses Eddy Current for camera stabilization. Thanks to an aluminium ring and a circular array of neodymium magnets the patent pending Magnetic Rotor provides frictionless rotational damping. It works on the same principle as the braking systems of high-speed trains or roller coasters.

The proprietary Torsion Limiter almost perfectly eliminates the pendulum effect, which is the most common disadvantage of the traditional counter-weighted gimbals.

SteadyCross has a rigid aluminium and stainless steel body, while all the custom-designed parts are 3D printed and made of TitanX*, a high-performance industrial grade ABS plastic. Self-aligning bearings and super strong neodymium magnets ensure efficiency, while the comfortable rubber grip handles, the Manfrotto compatible quick release plate and the tripod legs offer a user friendly experience.

SteadyCross Step by Step setup tutorial:

SteadyCross can handle Handycam, Bridge, MILC or DSLR cameras up to 3.5lbs (1600g), but it’s optimized for Mirrorless Cameras. While putting a bigger payload on the rig is not recommended, a slightly heavier camera setup may still work properly with a marginally slower follow mode on the pan axis.

By releasing a couple of screws with the supplied hex wrench, you can easily dismantle the arms which makes it simpler to pack the stabilizer in a bag or luggage.

We are a team of multimedia experts and R&D specialists located in north Hungary. During our work we often had to use camera stabilizers, and it was never a flawless experience for us. We found all mechanical stabilizers quite difficult to use and less effective, and even with the most expensive motorized gimbals we frequently had technical issues. We thought there must be another way, so we ventured into development. After years of R&D we have finally invented the world's first Magnetic Camera Stabilizer and prepared for mass production.

We use the latest FDM-3D printing technology to manufacture the custom parts of the rig, which are made of TitanX* a high-performance ABS plastic. This industrial grade engineering material assures the highest possible strength, durability and temperature tolerance. In addition, 3D printing allows us to continuously develop without compromises and without the physical and financial constraints of CNC-machining or injection molding. By using a cutting edge 3D printing farm we can also keep our production costs low. 

SteadyCross rigs are manufactured and assembled by our team without any third party manufacturing or fulfillment supplier on another continent. We have perfected all our processes, tested our vendors and have already started production. While scaling up our capacity on demand might pose some challenges in case of an unexpected level of success, delivery for early backers will start right after the campaign!

 

SteadyCross is Now Ready to Hit the Market &
Change the World of Camera Stabilizers

 

Pre-Order Yours Before it's Sold Out!

 

Q: When will the product be shipped?
A: Delivery for early backers will start right after the campaign in March! Since we manufacture all SteadyCross rigs completely in-house, shipping will be a continuous process: once your rig is assembled and tested, we’ll ship it for you immediately. The actual shipping date depends on when you’ve placed your order.

Q: Do I have to pay customs or VAT?
A: If you’re located in the US or in the EU then you won't be charged for any extra fees. However, customers outside the US and EU may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees levied by the destination country once a shipment reaches the recipient's country and must be fulfilled by the recipient. We have no control over these charges.

Q: Which countries do you ship to?
A: We ship worldwide.

Q: What will the retail price be?
A: The planned retail price is 399 USD.

Q: What happens if my address changes prior to shipping?
A: If you need to update your address, contact us at support@steadycross.com

Q: What is the refund policy?
A: Please refer to Indiegogo's policy here: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

Q: How can I cancel my order?
A: Please refer to Indieogo's policy here: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

Q: How can I contact the SteadyCross team?
A: You can reach us in the Indiegogo comment section, alternatively on Facebook (@SteadyCross) or simply send us an email at 
support@steadycross.com

story:
WAKELITE 3D is a novelty camera flash attachment, which aims to revolutionise shooting pictures with flash, providing new opportunities and joy to photography enthusiasts.

 

I am Istvan Budai, a photographer with more than 40 years of professional experience.During my travels, besides photographing the wildlife and nature, it has always been important for me to get to know different cultures, people and faces, and to eternalise them in my pictures.

Lined lighting, and the dimensions of the venue will result in subpar takes. On modern devices, ISO can be set to high values, but the issue remains,and even increases. Using direct flash, bright areas on the picture will burn out. WAKELITE 3D with its silver lining provides excellent illumination even for the couples dancing in the background, up to the highest motions.

During my works, if I had to use flash, I was always disturbed by the flattened, shady outcome. I purchased and used every accessory that was designed to help reduce the problem above, but none could provide a complete solution. All of them decreased shadows, but also decreased key light as well, losing the “brilliance” of the picture. Their questionable results were only applicable with a low ceiling, only up to 3-. 5meters. My drive towards excellence led me to the development of WAKELITE 3D a?er more than 10 years of trial.

3D printing technology allowed me to develop the final iteration of a prototype, resulting in the invention of the WAKELITE 3D flash attachment. The wavy surface pattern of the WAKELITE 3D increases the reflection of light from the flash by up to 20 percent, distributing light to all directions, bathing the surroundings in brilliant glimmer, shining light to the subject and eliminating shadows. Key light remains, light loss is negligible.
 

Portraits and object photos are sculptural, colors are bright. The range of the device is 20-30 meters, taking full potential of the capabilities of the flash.

 

The main idea behind the invention is, not to hold back light, but use the flash in a ways to keep the key light, and fill in shadows. Using two or three flashes and a bit of experimenting can easily result in a picture without shadows, close to natural lighting even in a spacious enclosure. “We can keep a studio lighting in our pocket on a bargain, which is not even connected to a power line.” Can be kept in a small photo bag, or even in your pockets.
The installation of WAKELITE 3D takes only a single motion. The strap can be kept on the flash (even in a photo bag).

The reflecting insert has a shiny silver finish by default, but 3 options are available for purchase (white, gold and silver) to match the composition.

WAKELITE 3D is compatible with almost all available flashes with its elastic strap. The product is ready for mass production.
 

Istvan Budai, Photographer, Inventor

 

Silver-White-Gold-Grey How to use the reflecting inserts


Thousands of pictures shot during the years prove that using WAKELITE3D we can shot exceptionally good pictures. By experiments we managed to perfect flash photography with various inserts.

By exchanging inserts we can shoot wide variety of shadowless, sculptural pictures. By rotating the flash head we can discover new dimensions in creative photography. It’s an extraordinary experience creating new pictures by experimenting with reflected, diffused light. It fills in the background beautifully, still key light remains. Only in rear cases is it necessary to use multiple flashes. When we encounter spatious rooms, halls we can use 2-3 flashes. in this case we can use white as key light, silver as background, grey as filler to shoot beautiful pictures.

 

Note: In the image below you can see, that when we arrived to Szidónia Hotel the londiner asked if he could help us carry in the lots of stuff, because a former photographer had huge amounts of equipment.

 

TIMELINE

CURRENT STATUS

The product is ready for Mass Production!

story:
This Indiegogo campaign has ended  with over 1,200 amazing backers. The TriLens is now available on www.friidesigns.com

At Frii Designs we're on a mission to give photographers around the world the opportunity to experiment more when they're in the heat of the moment.

Many of us have a collection of amazing lenses - each with a specific purpose. But on location you can't risk missing the moment. You need to move FAST and there is no time to fiddle around with lens caps and bulky bags!

We have designed a product that makes carrying and SWITCHING lenses an extremely smooth and fast process. Designed by carefully studying the workflow of professional photographers – we now present the TriLens ™

 

 

 

The TriLens™ is designed to give you freedom. Never miss that breathtaking view in the wild or moment at the wedding. Quickly adapt to new circumstances when shooting documentaries or swap lenses in an instant when you're taking portraits. By having your favorite glass right on your hip and reducing the time of changing lenses the TriLens™ will give you the freedom to experiment more when you're on location.

We only use high strength steel and fiber reinforced nylon to make sure you don’t have to worry about anything else than what’s in front of your camera. To ensure high quality and reliability the TriLens™ is designed, manufactured and assembled here in Sweden. The TriLens™ is weather resistant and designed to withstand loads up to 100 kg, just in case you would want to carry a space telescope through a war zone.

 

Teles, normals, primes.. No matter your lens combination the center of gravity will automatically adjust to be as low as possible. The Auto-friction mechanism will keep the TriLens™ stable when walking or running by automatically adjusting the force needed to rotate the housing depending on the weight and size of your lenses.

 

The TriLens™ fastens to your favorite belt. The belt clip is curved to fit your body and the wide base will distribute the load evenly over your hip so you can shoot all day. The housing can easily be removed and attached to the belt clip by using the spring loaded quick release when it's time for a break.

Each TriLens™ is shipped with five sets of magnetic arcs. The magnets adheres to your lens caps and magically snaps to your empty slot on the housing. This protects your empty slots from dust and makes misplaced lens caps a thing of the past.

 

 

Order through Indiegogo and save up to 35%

The TriLens is already shipping to thousands of photographers worldwide! We've been working day and night to keep up with demand and can now offer shipping within just 7 days! By placing a pre-order on Indiegogo you will save up to 35% off the retail price and get it before it's available to the public.

The TriLens is already shipping to thousands of photographers worldwide!

Check out more photos from our backers under #TriLens!

 

Frii Designs was founded from the vision of making life easier for photographers. We're based in Stockholm, Sweden and have a strong belief in the notion that everything is possible as long as the passion is present. Frii Designs was founded by Jonas Lundin, a photographer and mechanical engineer specialized in industrial design from Lund university. By his side stands Hampus Lundin, a biomedical engineer from Linköping university with a passion for automation and production. The siblings practically grew up in the their family garage building bikes, 3D-printers and video equipment and have over the years developed a great sense for design and ability to co-operate.

"With a passion for photography and design there's nothing that excites me more than helping photographers around the globe to realize their full potential."

- Jonas Lundin, CEO and inventor of the TriLens™

 

 

 

Brand name --------------------------------------------------------- Frii Designs

Product name ---------------------------------------------------------- TriLens™

Major materials ------------------------- Steel and fiber reinforced nylon

Color -------------------------------------------------------------------------- Black

Compatibility ------------------------------ Canon EF, Sony E/FE, Nikon F

Size --------------------------------- 160 x 100 x 100 mm | 6.3 x 3.9 x 3.9"

Weight ---------------------------------------------------------- 295 g | 0.65 lbs

Load rating ---------------------------------------------------- 100 kg | 220 lbs

Maximum lens diameter ------------------------------------ 92 mm | 3 5/8"

Country of origin ------------------------------------------------------- Sweden
story_txt:
This Indiegogo campaign has ended  with over 1,200 amazing backers. The TriLens is now available on www.friidesigns.comAt Frii Designs we're on a mission to give photographers around the world the opportunity to experiment more when they're in the heat of the moment.Many of us have a collection of amazing lenses - each with a specific purpose. But on location you can't risk missing the moment. You need to move FAST and there is no time to fiddle around with lens caps and bulky bags!We have designed a product that makes carrying and SWITCHING lenses an extremely smooth and fast process. Designed by carefully studying the workflow of professional photographers – we now present the TriLens ™Eliminate the time and frustration of changing lenses. The TriLens™ safely carries up to three extra lenses, is rated for loads up to 100 kg and magically keeps track of your lens caps.    
 
  The TriLens™. Patented by design
 
The TriLens™ is designed to give you freedom. Never miss that breathtaking view in the wild or moment at the wedding. Quickly adapt to new circumstances when shooting documentaries or swap lenses in an instant when you're taking portraits. By having your favorite glass right on your hip and reducing the time of changing lenses the TriLens™ will give you the freedom to experiment more when you're on location.Wedding, commercial, event, video. The TriLens™ is designed to adapt.
 
We only use high strength steel and fiber reinforced nylon to make sure you don’t have to worry about anything else than what’s in front of your camera. To ensure high quality and reliability the TriLens™ is designed, manufactured and assembled here in Sweden. The TriLens™ is weather resistant and designed to withstand loads up to 100 kg, just in case you would want to carry a space telescope through a war zone.High strength steel, fiber reinforced nylon. Rated for 100 kg / 220 lbs The safety pins will make it impossible to remove the lens without pushing and twisting simultaneously.
 
Teles, normals, primes.. No matter your lens combination the center of gravity will automatically adjust to be as low as possible. The Auto-friction mechanism will keep the TriLens™ stable when walking or running by automatically adjusting the force needed to rotate the housing depending on the weight and size of your lenses.Carry any combination of lenses. The Auto-friction mechanism keeps the TriLens™ stable when walking or running.
 
The TriLens™ fastens to your favorite belt. The belt clip is curved to fit your body and the wide base will distribute the load evenly over your hip so you can shoot all day. The housing can easily be removed and attached to the belt clip by using the spring loaded quick release when it's time for a break.The belt clip securely fastens to your favorite belt.
 
Each TriLens™ is shipped with five sets of magnetic arcs. The magnets adheres to your lens caps and magically snaps to your empty slot on the housing. This protects your empty slots from dust and makes misplaced lens caps a thing of the past.Keep track of your lens caps and protect your lenses from dust with the magnetic cap system. 
1 x Beltclip | 1 x Housing | 1 x Frii pouch | 5 x Sets of Cap Magnets | 3 x Protection caps  Order through Indiegogo and save up to 35%The TriLens is already shipping to thousands of photographers worldwide! We've been working day and night to keep up with demand and can now offer shipping within just 7 days! By placing a pre-order on Indiegogo you will save up to 35% off the retail price and get it before it's available to the public.The TriLens is already shipping to thousands of photographers worldwide!Check out more photos from our backers under #TriLens! Frii Designs was founded from the vision of making life easier for photographers. We're based in Stockholm, Sweden and have a strong belief in the notion that everything is possible as long as the passion is present. Frii Designs was founded by Jonas Lundin, a photographer and mechanical engineer specialized in industrial design from Lund university. By his side stands Hampus Lundin, a biomedical engineer from Linköping university with a passion for automation and production. The siblings practically grew up in the their family garage building bikes, 3D-printers and video equipment and have over the years developed a great sense for design and ability to co-operate. "With a passion for photography and design there's nothing that excites me more than helping photographers around the globe to realize their full potential." - Jonas Lundin, CEO and inventor of the TriLens™   Brand name --------------------------------------------------------- Frii DesignsProduct name ---------------------------------------------------------- TriLens™Major materials ------------------------- Steel and fiber reinforced nylonColor -------------------------------------------------------------------------- BlackCompatibility ------------------------------ Canon EF, Sony E/FE, Nikon FSize --------------------------------- 160 x 100 x 100 mm | 6.3 x 3.9 x 3.9"Weight ---------------------------------------------------------- 295 g | 0.65 lbsLoad rating ---------------------------------------------------- 100 kg | 220 lbsMaximum lens diameter ------------------------------------ 92 mm | 3 5/8"Country of origin ------------------------------------------------------- Sweden

story:
I've been working as an assistant and second shooter to a wonderfully talented photographer for over 4 years.  Now its time for me to strike out on my own but I'm gonna need a bit of help to get my business off the ground.  


I currently own a Canon T1i and a 50mm prime lens.  This camera is not a professional grade DSLR however and cannot be used in a professional manner. 
 
                                                                Camera Bodies
*I plan to purchase a Canon 5D Mark 2 ($1800 for the body only) or 3 ($3400 for the body only).
Canon is proud to present the highly anticipated EOS 5D Mark III. With supercharged EOS performance and stunning full frame, high-resolution image capture, the EOS 5D Mark III is designed to perform. Special optical technologies like the 61-Point High Density Reticular AF and an extended ISO range of 100-25600 (expandable to 50 (L), 51200 (H1) and 102400 (H2) make the EOS 5D Mark III ideal for shooting weddings in the studio or out in the field, and great for still photography. Advanced professional-level high definition video capabilities (that includes a host of industry-standard recording protocols and enhanced performance) make it possible to capture beautiful cinematic movies in EOS HD quality. A newly designed 22.3 Megapixel full-frame Canon CMOS sensor, Canon DIGIC 5+ Image Processor, and shooting performance up to 6.0 fps provide exceptional clarity and sharpness, even when capturing rapidly-unfolding scenes. Additional technological advancements include an Intelligent Viewfinder, Canon's advanced iFCL metering system, High Dynamic Range (HDR), and Multiple Exposure mode - all of which that help make the EOS 5D Mark III the perfect multimedia tool.

                                                                         Lenses
I will also require a few different lenses to be able to provide the types of packages I hope to offer.

*Canon EF 24-105mm f/4 L IS USM Lens

The 24-105 L is one of my favorite general purpose lenses, but it also works well for portraits. I would stay back slightly farther than tight head-shot framing distance with this lens on a full frame camera, but there is plenty of portrait usage remaining in this lens. The f/4 aperture is not going to create background blur as strong as the wider aperture options ($1200)

*Canon EF 135mm f/2 L USM Lens

Wide f/2 Aperture, L Lens Build Quality & Performance

The 135mm focal length is still a slightly long focal length for a general purpose portrait lens, but this lens is dramatically smaller, lighter and less expensive than the 200 f/2 IS. And it will produce memorable portraits. Though this is one of Canon's older (but still current) lenses, it performs very well in all regards. Again, this lens will work double duty as an indoor action lens. ($1100)

*Canon EF 85mm f/1.8 USM Lens

The Canon 85 f/1.8 is a nicely-priced, wide aperture compact prime lens with very good image quality and fast autofocus. Great for portraits ($420

*Canon EF-S 60mm f/2.8 Macro USM lens
For underwater shoots as well as product shots
 a telephoto prime lens and the first true macro lens of their EF-S series, made specifically for "APS-C" format Canon SLR cameras. It produces 1:1 magnification for extremely detailed close-up images and with a 35mm focal length equivalence of 96mm, it is also ideal for medium telephoto applications including portraiture. Its maximum aperture of f/2.8 is effective in low light and offers shallow depth of field control. ($470)

                                                        Housings and accessories 

*Ikelite 6871.03 Underwater Housing for Canon 5D Mark III DSLR

for shooting underwater.

a waterproof case for the Canon 5D Mark III DSLR camera. The housing is a clear polycarbonate case rated to a depth of 200' and the auto exposure lock and focus lock are placed where they can be activated with your thumb while taking a picture. Camera installation is quick and simple and the o-ring seal can be checked visually through the clear housing. ($1800 for the body only)

*60mm lens port necessities for use with the underwater housing body. 

Port Option 1 - Interchangeable Components

This Port Option requires the combination of two product numbers.

Both Glass Flat Front and Lens Extension are required to create a complete port.

Modular Glass Flat Front

  • When used underwater, flat ports bend light in such a way that the resulting image is magnified. This makes flat ports ideal for shooting small subjects with a standard, macro or zoom lens. The Modular Glass Flat Front features a durable, optical grade glass front element.
  • A flat port reduces the angle of coverage of a lens when used underwater. If full angle of coverage is desired, use a dome port instead.
  • The Modular Glass Flat Front can be combined with different Lens Extensions to accommodate a wide variety of lenses. ($200)


Lens Extension 3.5-Inch

Use Flat Front in combination with:

Product Number 5510.16

  • The Lens Extension 3.5-inch threads onto the back of either the Modular Glass Flat Front or Modular 8-inch Dome for use with a variety of lenses.
  • This is the shortest Lens Extension that accepts this Canon 60mm Macro lens. Lens Extension 3.5-inch (Product Number 5510.16) or Lens Extension 4.25-inch (Product Number 5510.24) may be used in place of this Lens Extension to with no adverse effects on the image ($150)

                                                   Software
Photoshop CC and Lightroom are as essential to your photography as your camera and lens, giving you the tools to organize, edit, enhance, and share images on your desktop or mobile device — anytime, anywhere. Master new skills with an extensive library of how-to videos, and always have access to the latest imaging innovations from Adobe.
Adobe now works with a creative cloud so its an annual payment of $120 to stay up to date with the latest versions of the software.
with luck I'll be able to pay for two years of service with this campaign costing ($240)

                                                Accessories 
Extra battery pacs 2X ($160)
Memory Cards 64GB 3X ($200)
Wireless Remote ($24)

I'll add the specs on the other gear I plan to get soon ie lights tripods etc.

story:
Short Summary

Hello, My name is David Fulton. I have been a photographer for over 35 yrs

Have you been in a situation where you have  low light/slow shutter speed and a tripod cannot be used? In 2010 i found myself in Cordova Alaska  on assignment for Frommer's book Alaska Day by Day. my assignment required that I do a lot of hiking up mountains, thru forest, on the water, in kayaks,and in inflatable skiffs. The editor wanted me to shoot in raw at the lowest ISO I could use. as you know the lower the ISO the better the resolution, so the problem I encountered was shooting at ISO 100 using a telephoto lens with a very slow shutter speed. I used a tripod whenever I could, but there many times when a tripod wouldn't work, like standing in a kayak , standing on a log in a lake, and on an unlevel slope. I had to stabilize my camera for low light,slow shutter speeds.

One day it came to me that if I could attach a chain to my camera, put my foot on the chain , lift up until the chain was taut, I would have a steady, level platform to take low light/ slow shutter speed shots at ISO 100. The chain pod was born. It adjust in seconds , stabilizes my camera, and the photos come out clear and sharp. My editor loved my shots. i would like every photographer to have this tool.

With the help from every one I can produce this photography tool so every photographer will have one in their camera bag.

What We Need & What You Get

What I would like to do is produce the chain pod for under $10.00 so every one can buy one. The money raised is going to go to advertisement , $500.00 a month for three months. Bolts 5000., split rings 5000, . 40,000 ft of chain. Employes to assemble the chain pods in the USA . Printing and packaging.For every $10.00 you will receive one chain pod. For $20.00 you will receive 2 chain pods . for $50.00 You will receive 5 chain pods and the knowledge of knowing you have made a dream come true for all photographers that want to buy the chain pod in the future. For those that cannot fund the project, you help in networking the project will get my humble gratitude.

Thank you every one for your support.in this project. If i am not total funded  I will use the money for advertisement to help sell the Chain pod.

The Impact

I would like to see the chain pod affordable, so any one can buy one. Every one that already has one loves it. With the help from you we can make the chain pod a universal product that every photographer will know what it is!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can not fund the project, please spread the word the networking, and using the Indiegogo share tools . This will help and you will have my humble graditude.

Thank you David Fulton

www.davidroyfultonphotography.com

story:
Friends!

As you probably know, photography is my passion, my life, my work. Primarily unpaid work, but important work, impactful work, inspired work, nonetheless. I have chosen not to take a paid job so that I can carry out Humans of Portland, a project that I believe helps humanize the people of Portland and hope inspires connection and community. Humans of Portland means more to me than just about any salary, but unfortunately some situations call for real live dollar bills...

I need your help

It's never fun to ask for help, but we all need a little help sometimes. Here's my situation: 

  • My camera gear, including my photo backpack, my external flash, a personal lens, an extra camera battery and a rented lens were all stolen from me. 
  • My insurance doesn't cover the cost of the rented lens, which is $1800 to replace.
  • My insurance only covers about $100 to replace my personal items, leaving the other $500 up to me.

Can you contribute?

$5, $10, $25, $50 - anything helps!

My insurance only covers about $100 to replace my personal items, leaving the other $500 up to me.
Can you contribute?$5, $10, $25, $50 - anything helps!

story:
Allen Clark has helped us, the Independent Musicians...

For years, Allen has shot and edited photos and videos for us, the independent musicians, for free. He has helped us advance our careers by providing things that we never could have otherwise afforded. He is one of the biggest supporters of Indie Music in the Nashville scene.

And it's not because he is trying to increase his portfolio. Over the years, Allen has been one of the most respected photographers in the nation, shooting such public figures as:

  • George Bush
  • Julian Assange
  • Tom Brokaw
  • Norman Schwartzkopf
  • Jim Gaffigan

SPORTS:

  • Tony Hawk
  • Josh Hamilton
  • Carmelo Anthony
  • Shawn White
  • Cal Ripken, Jr.

MUSIC

  • Imogen Heap
  • Norah Jones
  • David Gray
  • Dave Matthews
  • Ludacriss

(You can see more of his work at http://www.allenclarkphotography.com)

In short, he has given us professional-level photography work and has charged us a fraction of the price, often doing his work for free.

Last month, all of Allen's photography equipment was stolen while shooting a video for one of us in New Orleans.

Maybe if he had charged us more, his gear would have been insured. But it wasn't. So this is our chance to help him like he has helped us.

What We Need

Here is a list of the gear Allen needs to get back to work:

  • Nikon D600 ($1,900.00)
  • Nikon 50mm 1.8 ($100.00)
  • 2 Nikon SB900 Flashes ($500.00 each)
  • Nikon 16-85 f3.5/5.6 ($477.00)
  • Nikon MB D14 ($322.00)
  • Nikon 80-200 F2.8 (used) ($1,199.00)

This brings us to a total of $4,998.00

Other Ways You Can Help

If you have some of the listed equipment above that you would be willing to sell, get in touch! We, the musicians, don't know a lot about photography gear (the above list was copy/pasted from Allen) but we can put you in touch with him directly. If we can get some of this gear for a lower price than we have listed above: AWESOME.

story:
What is it

As a professional photographer, you may need show the images to your client while you are shooting, print the photos as soon as you just finish the capture, or send the photos to your editors in the shortest time.

But it is is too slow for using built-in Wifi of the cameras or WiFi sd card. The speed is only about 2-3M bytes/s. To send a raw file to a computer, it normally takes 10-30 seconds. Using USB cable is faster, but it is not convenient.

CamFi Pro helps you to solve these problems.

CamFi Pro is the fastest wireless camera controllers in the world. It uses 802.11 ac to transfer the photos from the camera which is 2-3 times faster than most of the built-in Wi-Fi cameras and other 802.11 n wireless camera controllers. You can use iPhone, Android, PC or Mac to control your camera remotely. And you can print or preview your photo as you’re shooting. It supports Canon, Nikon, and Sony. And it is the only 802.11 ac wireless tether solution for Sony cameras in current market. CamFi Pro will save you a lot of time when transferring the images and avoid shooting from an awkward pose, boost your productivity.

How to mount it

* L bracket or dual hot shoe bracket needs additional purchase. 

Features

Auto transmit photos as shooting


CamFi Pro supports automatically transmitting and show photos on the connected devices ( mobile, PC or Mac) as soon as they are taken. With the 802.11ac, you can get the picture from camera more easily and quickly than ever before. Both raw and jpeg are supported. You may also use selective transfer for only transfer jpeg and save raw on SD card.

 

Smooth live view and powerful remote control

With the high transfer speed, you may enjoy the smooth live view of the camera remotely, touch the screen to auto focus, adjust shutter speed, aperture, iso with the app. You may easily use a large screen device as a monitor to check the focus and other camera settings.

 

Sony support

CamFi does not only support Canon and Nikon, but also Sony cameras. Photographers can view the live view on the client device, change the ISO, shutter speed and aperture and shoot remotely. It can also be used as the second monitor for video recording. Smooth live view and large screen of iPad bring the amazing user experience.

 

HDR

Focus Stacking

CamFi Pro also supports HDR and focus stacking, which are often used by many professional photographers.  More advanced program mode are in developing. It will combine HDR and focus stacking together,  improve the productivity massively.  

Multiple Camera Control

CamFi Pro can work with multiple cameras. You can trigger numerous cameras to shoot simultaneously. After the shooting, it will transfer and group the photos to the server automatically, build the video and playback. By using 5.8G Hz band, it effectively avoids interference by other wireless signals, which makes it is easy to set up on the event show. It can be applied to build the bullet time effect and 3D modeling.

 

Auto Print

With CamFi Pro and CamFi Matrix (software), you can auto print the photos while you are shooting. You can also set the template or watermark to your picture. It improves the productivity greatly for the busy photographers.

 

Tech Specs

Width: 4.13in

Height: 2.42in

Length: 1.48in

Weight: 5.4oz ( Batteries included)

Battery: 3200mAh Replaceable 

Battery Life: 3 hours ( can be charged while working)

Distance: 60 meters

Wifi: 802.11ac, 5.8Hz

 

Supported Cameras

Featured in

Timeline

 

CamFi Story

In 2015, we released CamFi wireless camera controller successfully. It has been widely used in many industries worldwide, such as photography, 3D modeling, health care. In these two years, we have got many suggestions from the professional photographers, which inspired us to develop the new generation product, CamFi Pro. The support from you will allow us to bring our ideas to life and make some of the best photography gear on the market. We hope you’ll join us for the next step of the journey.

Our website: http://cam-fi.com

Product page: http://cam-fi.com/en/camfi-pro/index.html

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CamFi-Limited-10935023...

Press kit: http://www.cam-fi.com/files/media-kit/PressKit_CamFiPro.zip
story_txt: What is itAs a professional photographer, you may need show the images to your client while you are shooting, print the photos as soon as you just finish the capture, or send the photos to your editors in the shortest time.But it is is too slow for using built-in Wifi of the cameras or WiFi sd card. The speed is only about 2-3M bytes/s. To send a raw file to a computer, it normally takes 10-30 seconds. Using USB cable is faster, but it is not convenient.CamFi Pro helps you to solve these problems.CamFi Pro is the fastest wireless camera controllers in the world. It uses 802.11 ac to transfer the photos from the camera which is 2-3 times faster than most of the built-in Wi-Fi cameras and other 802.11 n wireless camera controllers. You can use iPhone, Android, PC or Mac to control your camera remotely. And you can print or preview your photo as you’re shooting. It supports Canon, Nikon, and Sony. And it is the only 802.11 ac wireless tether solution for Sony cameras in current market. CamFi Pro will save you a lot of time when transferring the images and avoid shooting from an awkward pose, boost your productivity.How to mount it* L bracket or dual hot shoe bracket needs additional purchase. FeaturesAuto transmit photos as shootingCamFi Pro supports automatically transmitting and show photos on the connected devices ( mobile, PC or Mac) as soon as they are taken. With the 802.11ac, you can get the picture from camera more easily and quickly than ever before. Both raw and jpeg are supported. You may also use selective transfer for only transfer jpeg and save raw on SD card. Smooth live view and powerful remote controlWith the high transfer speed, you may enjoy the smooth live view of the camera remotely, touch the screen to auto focus, adjust shutter speed, aperture, iso with the app. You may easily use a large screen device as a monitor to check the focus and other camera settings. Sony supportCamFi does not only support Canon and Nikon, but also Sony cameras. Photographers can view the live view on the client device, change the ISO, shutter speed and aperture and shoot remotely. It can also be used as the second monitor for video recording. Smooth live view and large screen of iPad bring the amazing user experience. HDRFocus StackingCamFi Pro also supports HDR and focus stacking, which are often used by many professional photographers.  More advanced program mode are in developing. It will combine HDR and focus stacking together,  improve the productivity massively.  Multiple Camera ControlCamFi Pro can work with multiple cameras. You can trigger numerous cameras to shoot simultaneously. After the shooting, it will transfer and group the photos to the server automatically, build the video and playback. By using 5.8G Hz band, it effectively avoids interference by other wireless signals, which makes it is easy to set up on the event show. It can be applied to build the bullet time effect and 3D modeling. Auto PrintWith CamFi Pro and CamFi Matrix (software), you can auto print the photos while you are shooting. You can also set the template or watermark to your picture. It improves the productivity greatly for the busy photographers. Tech SpecsWidth: 4.13inHeight: 2.42inLength: 1.48inWeight: 5.4oz ( Batteries included)Battery: 3200mAh Replaceable Battery Life: 3 hours ( can be charged while working)Distance: 60 metersWifi: 802.11ac, 5.8Hz Supported CamerasFeatured inTimeline CamFi StoryIn 2015, we released CamFi wireless camera controller successfully. It has been widely used in many industries worldwide, such as photography, 3D modeling, health care. In these two years, we have got many suggestions from the professional photographers, which inspired us to develop the new generation product, CamFi Pro. The support from you will allow us to bring our ideas to life and make some of the best photography gear on the market. We hope you’ll join us for the next step of the journey.Our website: http://cam-fi.comProduct page: http://cam-fi.com/en/camfi-pro/index.htmlFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/CamFi-Limited-10935023...Press kit: http://www.cam-fi.com/files/media-kit/PressKit_CamFiPro.zip

story:
Dear Friends, Colleagues and Strangers

Few weeks ago I came back home to find out to my surprise that someone kicked my door in and helped himself to my most precious possessions: digital camera, laptop, external drive and light meter (the last one probably resembled a mobile phone bit too much...)

You could say 'all that can easily be replaced' and you would be right. With one exception- I had to wave good bye to most of my photos. Devastating, right? But now I am even more motivated to carry on with my photography journey and for that I need your pounds, dollars, euro... None of the currency would be discriminated!

Why do I start that campaign? Simply- I am typical example of somebody who followed the dreams and decided to study. Photography as a matter of fact. I have graduated few months ago. It will take me a bit longer to pay off my debts. In simple words- I'm skinned.

You can only imagine how much your support would mean to me but there will be something for you in it as well, apart of my eternal gratitude, which you don't have to imagine as it will be delivered to you!

I would have to ask you for your patience as well as contributions. To provide you with perks I will need some time to buy equipment and take the new pictures. That could be beneficial to you because you might want to have something specific, special and unique and you can tell me about it beforehand. Now, before you pull your credit card, seat down comfortably and think what that could be... and let me know... and I will try to stand up to your expectations!

What Mona Needs & What You Get

I need probably more funding than I am trying to raise in this campaign but it would be the great beginning!

What I need is:

  • the new camera body
  • at least one lens, preferably wide angle 
  • memory card
  • laptop/ notebook with good graphic card 
  • external drive for back- up
  • light meter

Perks for you:

  • surprise thank you card- it could be small print, paper cut-out or polaroid lift
  • jpg image straight to your e-mail inbox
  • photographic prints in different sizes
  • 2 h photo session in chosen London landmark

Perks for me:

  • Following my ideas and photography projects which is impossible without the gear
  • Continuing my blog (allovermyplace.wordpress.com)
  • Challenge of your ideas to set up my projects

What If You Can't Help Financially

Some of you can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Ask your folks to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Go to my facebook page and spread the word ( https://www.facebook.com/pages/Mona-Olichwier-Photography/123847284403262 )
  • visit my blog ( allovermyplace.wordpress.com )

And that’s all there is to it.

Thank you,

Mona

P.S. Please take under consideration that examples of my photography are just for you to get the idea as I have no original files any more. Hopefully I will be able to produce the new sets and share it with you soon.

It is designed for Small, Durable, Extreme and User-Friendly Purpose!

Sensor: HD CMOS sensor
- Video play format:Mp4
- Vibration resistant
- With 50M Waterproof Shell
- Multi-function for different usage

Extremely small, only 2.5 cm X 0.8 cm x 3.8 cm!
VERY LIGHT WEIGHT


High Definition & 170∘ Wide Angel 

Support video format:
720p = 1280x960 pixels (16:9), 60 FPS + 50 FPS+ 30 FPS+ 25 FPS
WVGA = 848x480 pixels (16:9), 60 FPS+ 50 FPS
VGA=320x 240 pixels (16:9), 120 FPS

Motion Detector and 60 fps allows you to capture moving objects precisely!



What We Aim for & Why we need money

  • Sales of Cost-Effective Camera for extreme purpose
  • Molding and other manufacturing set-up
  • Research and Development
  • Development of Extreme slow motion camera

Your contribution will be used to:

  • Cost for production of CamPico
  • Build our 2nd prototype (even smaller)
  • Compliance testing & Certifications

GET YOUR CamPico TODAY!


FAQ : 

1. If I pledge will I 100% get my CamPico? 

YES!  We are a flexible funding campaign. This means even if we do not reach our funding goal all pledgers will receive their CamPico.

2. Is my contributions refundable?  

All contributions on Indiegogo are nonrefundable according to the terms of use.


3. When will we receive our CamPico? 

Estimate time for packaging and shipment to our backer is November 2014.

4. What if I forgot to pay for shipping?

Adding shipping cost to your pledge is super easy to do. Just go to Contribute now and add the amount for the shipping cost. The shipping cost depends on the number of CamPico you are buying:

story:
This is  L U N A

 The World's Smallest 360º Camera                       中文贊助教學 ｜ 中文專案翻譯




Luna is a 360° camera designed for everyone. Handy, and with a single-button operation, Luna makes shooting in 360° as easy as taking photos with your phone.

Using a dual 190° fish-eye lens technology, Luna has no moving parts, allowing it to be small and sturdy. Waterproof, with gyro-stabilization, and a host of accessories, Luna is a perfect companion for your adventures, memories, and creativity.

In built wi-fi allows you to interactively preview 360° footage on your smartphone, immediately and wirelessly save it on your devices, share it on social media, and even live-stream moments in 360°. With Luna Cardboard and Luna’s mobile app, you can even view your videos in immersive virtual reality.

No camera rigs. No stitching. No cables. 360° video at the click of a button.


360° VIDEO Shot with Luna


360° videos are an exciting new medium. By letting the viewer decide where to look, 360° videos create an interactive, immersive environment.

Today, to shoot high quality 360° video, one needs expensive, bulky camera rigs and complicated stitching software. We’ve built Luna to make 360° video accessible to everyone.


( 360 video is currently supported on Chrome and on the YouTube mobile app. )



SEAMLESS


We’ve designed Luna from the ground up to fit seamlessly into your life. Just 6 cm in diameter, and weighing just over 180g, Luna can be best compared to a pool ball. This not only makes Luna easy to carry, but allows for effortless operation.

One click for panoramic 360° photographs. 

Two clicks for stunning full HD 360° videos. 

It’s that simple.


Luna is able to achieve this extraordinary size, due to its dual 2K, 190° fish-eye lens technology. Supported by advanced auto stitching, Luna is able to seamlessly combine images to create crisp, full 360° panoramic photos and video.


STURDY

No matter how hard you try, 2-dimensional photographs do not do justice to the magnitude of your adventures.  It is impossible to capture the enormity of the snow clad mountain range, the adrenaline fueled rush of a skydive, or even the breakneck pace of your jet ski. Luna enables you to really share these moments, allowing your friends and family to truly experience your adventures.

GYRO-STABILIZATION

WATERPROOF



SMART



VERSATILE

Luna’s magnetic adaptor allows Luna to not only stick to any magnetic surface, but also interface with a docking station, a monopod, a keychain, and a universal accessory adaptor.

Simply add 99$ to your pledge to include a complete accessory pack in your order

These accessories are designed with the same love and care as Luna. The handmade lambskin keychain ages beautifully while the stainless steel monopod evokes memories of the classic 80’s Minox German tripod. These accessories are true companions for your Luna.


FEATURED ON


SPECIFICATIONS

TIMELINE

REWARDS



STRETCH GOALS


We will continue to work tirelessly to make Luna better, stronger, and more capable. These stretch goals are just the beginning. With your love and support, we hope to achieve every single one of them!



TEAM
story_txt:

 The World's Smallest 360º Camera                       中文贊助教學 ｜ 中文專案翻譯

With Luna Cardboard and Luna’s mobile app, you can even view your videos in immersive virtual reality.
No camera rigs. No stitching. No cables. 360° video at the click of a button.


360° VIDEO Shot with Luna
360° videos are an exciting new medium. By letting the viewer decide where to look, 360° videos create an interactive, immersive environment.
Today, to shoot high quality 360° video, one needs expensive, bulky camera rigs and complicated stitching software. We’ve built Luna to make 360° video accessible to everyone.

( 360 video is currently supported on Chrome and on the YouTube mobile app. )




SEAMLESS




We’ve designed Luna from the ground up to fit seamlessly into your life. Just 6 cm in diameter, and weighing just over 180g, Luna can be best compared to a pool ball. This not only makes Luna easy to carry, but allows for effortless operation.

Two clicks for stunning full HD 360° videos. 
It’s that simple.


Luna is able to achieve this extraordinary size, due to its dual 2K, 190° fish-eye lens technology. Supported by advanced auto stitching, Luna is able to seamlessly combine images to create crisp, full 360° panoramic photos and video.

STURDY



No matter how hard you try, 2-dimensional photographs do not do justice to the magnitude of your adventures.  It is impossible to capture the enormity of the snow clad mountain range, the adrenaline fueled rush of a skydive, or even the breakneck pace of your jet ski. Luna enables you to really share these moments, allowing your friends and family to truly experience your adventures.

GYRO-STABILIZATION

WATERPROOF




SMART







VERSATILE



Luna’s magnetic adaptor allows Luna to not only stick to any magnetic surface, but also interface with a docking station, a monopod, a keychain, and a universal accessory adaptor.





Simply add 99$ to your pledge to include a complete accessory pack in your order

These accessories are designed with the same love and care as Luna. The handmade lambskin keychain ages beautifully while the stainless steel monopod evokes memories of the classic 80’s Minox German tripod. These accessories are true companions for your Luna.

FEATURED ON








SPECIFICATIONS





TIMELINE





REWARDS










STRETCH GOALS



We will continue to work tirelessly to make Luna better, stronger, and more capable. These stretch goals are just the beginning. With your love and support, we hope to achieve every single one of them!


TEAM




Memora Inc. was born at NASA Research Park in Mountain View, California. Most of our team met at Singularity University’s GSP program in the summer of 2014 and developed a keen interest in imaging technology and virtual reality.

Chiang Fon, Taiwan
Fon is the designer behind the FLUX 3D printer Kickstarter campaign. He uses Adobe Illustrator to do nearly everything in his life and deeply believes that “to create” is life.                                                                                                     fon@luna.camera

Ju Chun Ko, Taiwan
JC is a computer science PhD with a designer’s eye, an entrepreneurial mind and a hacker’s spirit. He co-founded Linkwish Inc. and teaches Interaction Design at National Taipei University of Technology.                                                   jc@luna.camera

Servando Canales, Mexico
Exponential Entrepreneur, Industrial Engineer, Singularity University Alumni. Passionate about technology and the impact it can have on tomorrow’s world.                                                                                                                                                  s@luna.camera

Gaurav Gupta, India
GG is an entrepreneur with a love for design and technology. A mechanical engineer by training, he loves tinkering as much as he loves spreadsheets.    gg@luna.camera

PARTNERS






In order to ensure complete technical support, we have partnered with Elan Microelectronics Corporation. Located in Taiwan Hsinchu Science Park, EMC’s subsidiary Avisonic is a leading solution provider for image process systems. We are confident that with the support of VP of AviSonic Meng-Chun (Kevin) Lin Ph.D and his team, we can easily resolve any manufacturing challenges we may face.





* start sharing 360 photos with portby now.


SPECIAL THANKS










The Final Ingredient: YOUWe have come a long way. We have engineered a camera that seemed impossible to build. We have developed the technology that allows it to seamlessly and automatically stitch videos. We have built the manufacturing partnerships that are needed to really deliver on our promises. Now all we need is you. With your support, we will be able to bring Luna to the world, making 360° videos accessible to everyone.






ＦＡＱ
Q: What is a 360° photo? 
A: You get 360° panoramic view in a photo ─  just by a click on Luna's only button.
Q: Where can I store the photos and videos? 
A: You can store them in the 32G built-in memory card, or transfer them to another device via Wifi.
Q: How long can the battery last at most when recording a video?
A:  30 minutes is the approximate continuous recording time.
Q: Can you charge and record a video at the same time?
A: Yes.
Q: What kind of devices can you use to watch Luna's live stream?
A: Basically all the devices that work with wifi, e.g. smartphones, tablets, smart TV´s are all applicable. (Works with both Android and iOS)
Q: What kind of devices can you use to watch Luna's VR content?
A: Listed on http://luna.camera/what-is-luna/. To name a few: Oculus Rift, GearVR, Google Cardboard; we're
still discussing with more possible partners. 
Basically any device with a 360 player can view VR content. Live VR is applicable in our app (so far we have Windows, android and iOS version). We'll also consider providing API in the future to developers. 
Q: Since Luna is spherical, would it difficult to shoot photos in a fixed position?
A: No worries. There are many accessories that go with Luna and some of them for sure can help you shoot photos in a fixed position. Even better, they are light and portable.


Risks
The current design and size of Luna is based on our current progress and our work with Taiwanese manufacturing and engineering design companies EMC & AviSonic.
The final product may look slightly different for safety and FCC regulatory reasons and the size may change (no larger than 3 inches according to our latest prototype).
360 footage is recorded and streamed in 2K (1920×960) resolution, but the quality and frame-rate of spherical / flattened videos when viewed differs depending on the type of display, display magnification and network signals.
Luna’s is designed to be IP68 waterproof. However, the waterproof level of the final product may be different according to multiple factors including battery heat, housing design, and WiFi signal etc.
According to our practical tests with the latest prototype, the current battery life is 31mins of continuous operation. However, the real battery life may be different according to the context and environment, and may also be constrained by the final product design.
We are confident that given our strong partnerships and robust R&D, we will be able to deliver Luna on time, as promised. In case of inevitable manufacturing delays, we will ensue that you are kept updated and well informed.

story:
Short Summary

Hi my name is Brandi Von Black. I'm a self-taught full time photographer of 4 and 1/2 years in Oklahoma and around the country. My favorite styles are alternative, edgy, fashion, portrait and pinup.

Recently my brand new laptop, photography equipment (even backup drives) were stolen and put my business in chaos. As of right now most of the work i do is reshoots (for free) refunds (paying back for shoots that were lost) and even small claims. Therefore, affording new items is very difficult right now. I've been working on a very old laptop that gives me the blue screen of death all the time, eats pictures, and none of the usb plugs work so i must edit hi res images using the touchpad and cannot back anything up. This fund will help me get everything back on track so i spend less time struggling with equipment and more time catching up and shooting!

What We Need & What You Get

The goal is $2000 dollars to cover the cost of a new laptop, new tablet, external hardrive, memory cards and a light

If the full goal is not met, funds gained will be applied towards the purchase of a new laptop :)

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you cannot contribute, please share the campaign so that hopefully we find others who may!!!! thank you for your time!

story:
Hi, thank you for viewing our campaign.  I’d like to introduce you to my daughter Kyra.  She is an amazing 11 year old with a passion for photography.  Even though she is only 11, she is a five time award winning photographer, having won five awards at the Iowa State Fair Photography Salon.  The Photography Salon at the Iowa State Fair has become one of the nation’s largest amateur photography contests.  Kyra has competed against other youth photographers up to age 17, and even against adult photographers in certain categories.  She won her first award when she was seven and to date has been awarded one first place ribbon, one second place ribbon, two honorable mentions, and one as yet unknown ribbon.  (She has an award at this year’s fair again, and we find out on August 5th what that award is…an update will be posted when we know.)  Roughly 30 percent of the photos submitted to the Photography Salon are accepted for display, and of those only a handful are given awards.  Just last year Kyra won an honorable mention in a category that included both adult and youth competitors.  She truly loves photography and has a natural eye for it.  I have encouraged her interest as it gives her a creative outlet and I feel it helps to expand her artistic horizons.  So now to the unfortunate reason for this campaign…

A little over a month ago, thieves broke out a window in our car, and stole Kyra’s backpack out of the trunk.  In the backpack was Kyra’s treasured Canon Rebel XT.  She had saved up for over a year to buy a used DSLR camera on eBay, and was heartbroken when her Canon was stolen.  She also lost two detachable lenses that came with the Rebel and the original Nikon point and shoot which was her very first camera.  Kyra has started down the long road to saving up for a new camera, but I would like to help her sooner than that.  Unfortunately, the thieves also decided to trash the inside of the car, damaging it so much that it was not feasible to repair it.  As it was an older car, it was not fully insured and I had to pay out of pocket for a new vehicle.  At this point in time I just don’t have enough money to purchase a new camera for my daughter.  I am letting her use my cheap point and shoot, but it’s just not the same experience for her after using a DSLR.  I am asking for help in purchasing anotherDSLR camera for my daughter.  Any donations will be used solely to purchase a replacement DSLR camera for Kyra, including lenses, backpack, and accessories. 

I have discussed this with Kyra, and she has agreed to offer prints of her photos as perks to say thank you to anyone who donates.  You can choose from any of the photos on her newly created Flickr page.  http://www.flickr.com/photos/cameraforkyra/ Just let us know which photo you want, and we will print a copy.  You can even have her sign it if you would like.  Thank you for taking the time to read this lengthy explanation, and a huge thank you to anyone who donates to this fund.  Your contributions are greatly appreciated and will help keep a budding photographer snapping away.

story:
Thank you for all your contributions to our campaign! It's so exciting to announce that we now are very close to the shipping stage! 

All Keychain cameras are well produced and we are doing the final optimizing! In order to give our sincere reward to the Indiegogo community, we decide to begin the shipment before our campaign ends!

We will begin to lock the contributions and begin the early shipping will begin on Dec 7th - you can receive your Keychain before Christmas! 

AKASO Keychain

Capture beautiful moments as they come completely effortlessly with the AKASO Keychain, you get the capabilities of a regular-sized camera at a fraction of the size. Record in 4K, capture time-lapses, record in slow motion, and more, all at the press of a button.

The saying goes, “a picture is worth a thousand words.”
Nowadays, a 4k video says a lot more. 

Press the capture button just once, and your hands are free to do everything else. Wave to an acquaintance, introduce yourself with a strong handshake, hi-five your friends, and even hug your loved ones.

*Please Note*
The 360° Pivot Stand come within the kit has a 1/4 inch screw hole that can be compatible with the GoPro accessories.

 Equipped with an advanced digital processor, the Keychain can record every moment in high definition 4k/30fps. Enjoy incredibly clear images with immense detail. The all-in-one smart app enables you to edit, filter, share your vlogs within seconds. Start creating your visual art with only several taps of your finger.

Thank you to all your contributions to this campaign, we are grateful to have you accompany us along the way. The AKASO Keychain has finally completed trial production, and the first batch will now be tested by our internal staff. Feedback from both our staff and from early test videos on youtube will be used to help us resolve any problems before moving on to final mass production. Thank you once again for your support and trust in the AKASO Keychain!

AKASO may be relatively new to the action camera sector, but in just over seven years it has become one of the leading action camera brands in the world. AKASO has collaborated with the movie, "The Endless Summer" to launch a joint action camera, ranked at the top of Amazon's action camera category, and with annual sales of more than 500,000 units, AKASO comes in just second place in global action camera sales, right behind the GoPro. We believe that our new 4K Vlog action camera⎯the AKASO Keychain, will surpass expectations!

story:
Introducing GTCAM

 

GTcam is a simple to setup and use IP camera for monitoring your baby, pets, family, home, and small office. It has ethernet and WiFi and it is certified to use Skype as the interfacing software via smartphone, tablet, and laptop/desktop. In fact you can use it anywhere you can use Skype!

Features

Ethernet or WiFi- Connect your camera via Ethernet cable or with WiFi to your home or office router

Recording via SD card slot-up to 4 days on a single card!

Microphone and Audio (optional external speaker)-hear what your baby or pets are saying and even talk back to them!

USB port (for optional LED nightlight and future Zigbee/Zwave Automation controller)

Access anywhere Skype runs (Android, IOS, Windows, Blackberry)

Easy setup-No Fussy CDs or DNS setup, 3 step setup process from a laptop or desktop for the first time. See video below for setup guide.

__________________________________________________________________________________

Why Skype?

Why did we decide to work with Skype instead of developing our own native mobile applications?

1) Skype is free to use with broad cross platform support across a wide range of devices and platforms including

Windows, IOS, Android, Blackberry, Linux, basically anywhere you can run Skype you can use this camera!

This also means we can access Skype/Microsoft's servers. Most IP cameras need to pay cloud storage and fees and if they don't pay or go under then the camera fails. Here even if Globalscale were to somehow cease to exist your camera would still work. Also our savings lets us pile savings back to consumers.

2) Skype is secure. A lot of IP cameras have been hacked recently putting peoples privacy at risk. Skype's hybrid peer to peer network is one of the most advanced and secure systems and we wanted to leverage that in our product. We have also added features requiring the owner to authorize any friends that want to use the camera in a very secure manner.

3) Skype can get around firewalls. a lot of very good IP cameras are blocked by even the most basic firewalls or have problems operating in the office environment. Skype is one of the best at getting around firewalls. Anywhere you can use Skype you can use the GTcam!

An estimated 400 million people have Skype accounts and know how easy it is to use

__________________________________________________________________________________

How can you use this camera               

Elderly Cam

Office/Warehouse Cam

Baby/Nanny Cam

Petcam

Classroom Cam

__________________________________________________________________________________


Who we are and how did we get here 

 We  are a small design and manufacturing company called Globalscale Technologies and we have created and certified a great new camera. We are headquartered in Anaheim that have been involved in a lot of open source software and development hardware since 2009 with open source development kits like the Sheevaplug and Smileplug. This has enabled a lot of creation in the developer, hacker, wireless, and networking space.

We actually took one of our original development designs and morphed it to create the GTcam which is a wired and wireless IP camera which uses the Skype protocol as the application to view the camera.You can view this camera using Skype on your smartphone, tablet and desktop computer.

You may have seen a similar project on indiegogo and other crowdfunding sites but we are the first and (as far as I know of) the only company  to be issued the formal license from Skype to build a standalone ip camera using their software and via there servers. Many people have certified product such as webcams and cameras for smart TVs. As such we are allowed to use the 'plugged into Skype' classification for certified embedded devices.

 

This was a long development and testing project that took over a year and a half of many engineers and people not just from our company but with partners as well. nonetheless we have obtained the license key so rest assured when you get this camera it is approved and ready to go! That is why we are confident we can ship product. After all this hard work we want to share the benefits and to improve the product with added features and into the retail space.

What is next?

We are seeking to raise a minimum of $2,000 for this project. First and foremost this will be used to build and distribute the cameras. While the design for the original is complete we used an off the shelf tooling for the first design We want to improve this design and add LED night vision and an external speaker and this will cost money for tooling and actual hardware. We will also need to re-certify the product with FCC and CE certification to ship in many countries. The purpose of this campaign is not only to fund improvements for the next generation GTcam but also to validate the design and market for this product.

_________________________________________________________________________________

Perks!

For the first perk you will receive this camera for a $99 Donation. It has WiFi, Ethernet, MicroSD slot, mic, and a 3.5mm audiojack. This camera will MSRP for $129 very shortly so you this is a great value for early adopters

Since the camera design is complete we are confident we will ship the existing model housing. If we do not reach our goal we will still ship cameras for the people who opt for this.

For the 2nd thru 5th perk we are going to sell essentially the same camera but with a new enclosure and with microSD card onboard for data recording. Here is the CNC/3D mockup with which we will build tooling for.

We have added an additional USB for external night vision LED and we will add a custom designed speaker for the audio jack so you can not only talk into it but talk back through the camera. The USB port will enable either LED lighting or an optional zwave/zigbee home automation dongle in the near future.

__________________________________________________________________________________

Risks

We know that hardware projects have risks as we have worked with hundreds of startups and companies since our inception. Alot of new companies underestimate the costs of building tooling, certifying hardware, and costs of shipping logistics. We ourselves have learned many lessons along the way but have gained the experience and capabilities to deliver the goods. We continually ship hardware everyday for our developers and customers and will treat you with the professionalism and service that people have come to expect and deserve. You can see our company and products we make here.

www.globalscaletechnologies.com

 There are videos of other startups and inventors whom we have helped to grow. (under case studies)

__________________________________________________________________________________

FAQ

Question 1: Are there any monthly fees I need to pay to use the GTcam?

Answer 1: No, GTcam is free to access and use

Question 2: Who can buy the GTcam, where do you ship to?

Answer 2: Anyone can buy and use the GTcam. However note are a US company and we cannot ship products to countries where  foreign trade has been banned or restricted for various reasons.

Also because of legal complications unrelated to us, we cannot sell this product directly into China (People's Republic of China). The GTcam works in China but US firms are prevented from selling this and similar products into the market.

Question 3:  What are the shipping costs?

Answer 3: Shipping in the continental US (not including Hawaii & Alaska) is included to help ease shipping logistics. It will be via FedEx, USPS or UPS and oversees it will vary according to country. Canada will be need to add $12 and international will be $30.There are some countries where shipping runs a high risk of being randomly getting stuck in customs (for example Turkey and Russia). These will ship at there own risk. 

Question 4: There was a similar product on Indiegogo earlier. What is going on?

Answer 4: Our GTcam was developed with Skype's Skypekit SDK and with technical partners from leading semiconductor firms. We were not the only firm to attempt to make this product but we were the first to be certified by Skype and gain 'Plugged into Skype' certification.

 What does this mean? it means that our camera passed a rigorous video and audio testing standard and we are authorized to ship consumer goods which access and utilize Skype's software and servers. Previously, developers trying to make this product were granted 60 day development licenses that would have to be renewed. This serves to ensure that only product tested and approved from Skype would be made. Rest assured with us you are getting certified product when we ship.

story:
What is this about?

  • Hello everyone. As you may or may not know, I have decided to chase my dreams by making photography/videography a full-time thing. The only problem is - my camera is very old, tired and doesn't have video capability. Oh, and I don't have photoshop. Yikes!
  • The $1800 will go towards a Canon 70D, lenses and possibly editing software..so, if I exceed my goal, that's perfectly OK!
  • Your contribution will be making my dream a reality, jump starting my career and I will owe you my undying gratitude, a hug and free photos! :)

Why should I help?

  • They say ask and ye shall receive. So, I ask...
  • I possess the talent and vision. I am merely missing the means to obtain the proper tools so that I may produce professional quality photos and videos- which is what I am on Earth to do. 
  • Your contribution will earn you a photo shoot with moi or a personalized print of your choice.
  • If I do not meet my goal of $1800, I will simply save whatever I get and use it towards the camera purchase when I have enough money saved.

The Impact

  • I'm ready to take the world by storm with some beautiful and inspiring art. 
  • The confidence and security of having a solid (and non-embarassing) camera to help translate my vision into something tangible will be the best gift anyone could give me at this point in my life. Really.
  • Once I am able to feel professional, I can BE professional. I'm ready to get my career started and to see where this journey takes me.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people can’t contribute financially, and that's OK!

  • Please make some noise about my campaign by sharing this status on Facebook or using your mobile/ e-mail machine to contact your photography friends to see if they may have some gently used equipment.
  • Or you could send some positive vibes/prayers my way!

story:
SHHHHH!!! THIS IS A SURPRISE BLESSING!

Jamey was electrocuted on February 21, 2007 by 7620 volts from an overhead power line. Here we are, 19 reconstructive surgeries later, and he is so thankful that the Lord redirected his talents! He gave him hope when the world gave him nothing but hopelessness. You are witnesses to this restoration and his zeal when it comes to picture taking! We praise the Lord for all he has done!

There is a particular lens that Jamey is needing for his camera. It is very expensive. This  lens will enable him to capture very detailed shots from far distances as well as movement.  Now that he is following the Ministry to other destinations, it can be very beneficial in places where he can't move about freely and be closer up to the speakers.

If you are led to do so, I would love to encourage you to give a financial blessing to go towards this gift. Any amount would be welcomed!  Even if you cannot bless financially, please bless him with your thoughts and prayers. God bless you all!

story:
My camera is dead.  

To continue my artwork, as well as to entertain all of my Facebook Friends, I really need a new camera! 

 I have chosen the Lumix DMC ZX40 as having all the basic features I need...plus it is last year's model so I can get a good price. 

I have been having health challenges, and as a self- employed person, that has led to poverty. 

I am planning on marketing some of my decorative landscape pix to help keep me afloat (treading water at least!) I can give details of those plans to anyone who is interested.

 If all of my pals donate even $1, I could be back in business!!!
