story:
PlexiDrone Begins Shipping Program

As of May 2018, DreamQii Inc. has begun the delivery perks that backers contributed towards during the PlexiDrone campaign.  The final step in preparing for these initial deliveries involved the design of limited edition Backer Exclusive packaging and navigating the very complex world of international shipments.


 

PlexiDrone Review & Support Videos

Below are the latest PlexiDrone Review and PlexiDrone customer support videos released on our DreamQii YouTube channels. Remember to Subscribe to our channels so you don't miss out on the next set of video tutorials!


Mass Production Approval!

After having built a batch of production quality PlexiDrones, DreamQii focused on refining the manufacturing process to support increased production rates and reduced cost, all without compromising quality. Getting a product ready for high volume production required attention to small details that would otherwise have major impacts on the end product, our customers, and our business.

Read more...

 

 

Ready for High Volume Production

Preparing components for high volume production required several stages of review and approval processed which began with an internal review of Design For Manufacturing (DFM) compliance. Key measures in part of this design assurance helped to eliminate issues before having invested in production tooling.

Read more...

 

Click here for a sample tooling design review.

 

Cutting Metal

Cutting metal is the point of no return in manufacturing.

If you’re going to cut metal, you had better be confident that the design is right! Each tool is good for 100,000 parts, so you’d better be happy with the results! Our team spent hundreds of hours qualifying prototype components and developing design standards before investing in this stage.

Read more...

 

Approving Production Samples

Every plastic component had to be inspected for imperfections in order to calibrate the injection mold process for mass production. This stage was as rigorous as the staged prior.

Read more...

 

Qualifying Parts at 600 FPS

Qualifying parts that are critical to flight safety is important to our customers and our business performance. This also means we got to break things in super slow motion. PlexiDrone’s battery plastics had to be qualified for safe transport in addition to safe flight. Yes, this means we had to drop batteries from every probable orientation and adjust designs until we believed they went just beyond our performance requirements.
 

 
Bonus: Click here for a sample cycle testing compliance summary of PlexiDrone’s detachable arm plastics. That sounds exciting!
 
 
 

First Backers Meet PlexiDrone X8!

Some of our earliest backers have already met PlexiDrone for the first time!  We'd like to thank Terry and Jacob for taking the time to meet with one of our lead designers (Gabriel Otrin) to un-box and play with the PlexiDrone X8, PlexiHub CS, and the PlexiPack HS backpack in person! 

 

 

Be ready to get up and flying when you meet your PlexiDrone for first time by subscribing to  Gabriel's YouTube channel. There you'll get an up-close look at your PlexiDrone with detailed explanations of its market leading features.

 

Packaging & Shipping

It is incredible how far the PlexiDrone development and production journey has taken us.  No matter how much progress is made, we (our dev team and our backers) have new challenges to overcome.  Most recently, our focus has been on product delivery, shipping, certification, and testing. 
 


 

PlexiDrone Product Packaging

Our team takes great pride in the quality & attention to detail for every aspect of the PlexiDrone product-line.  Part of delivering to our backers means that product packaging design must be ready to go and pass shipping requirements (things can get shaky in transit).  Not only that, but our packaging is a representation of our brand, and must extend itself to the retail environment.
 

visit | dreamqii.com 
for more details on our product packaging  
 

PlexiDrone Shipping Timeline

As stated in our last update, we are preparing to begin initial deliveries in June 2017. Based on our production and media schedule, we expect that all backer orders will be fulfilled within 60 to 90 days after delivery begins.  The challenges in shipping to over 97 countries are great, but our logistics team is working out  the details with our shipping gateways to reduce costs as much as possible with our new volumes (which are much higher than at end of original campaign).


 

Your PlexiDrone Shipping Info

Please make sure to log on to your PlexiDrone Cloud account and follow the instructions given on this customer support article to make certain your shipping address is up to date.  
 

 

Latest PlexiDrone YouTube Videos

 

 

New PlexiDrone Customer Support! 

DreamQii's Customer Support + Learning Center is an all-new system. You can now
contact customer support with a variety of methods, including via instant chat,
contact form, e-mail and by phone. You can review written communication thanks
to the ticket system that is tracked. 

Customer Support is also a Learning Center. Here you can learn how to become
more familiar with PlexiDrone and its product line. There are also countless
articles on more administrative topics and as well how-to guides on using
PlexiDrone Cloud on DreamQii.com

 

See for yourself with these top 5 articles:

  • Industry Leading Portability+Modular Design
  • Greater Power, Speed, & Safety of X8
  • Pay-Later Perk + Balance FAQ (IndieGoGo)
  • Shipping & Delivery FAQ (IndieGoGo)
  • Designed & Manufactured in North America

Terms and Conditions are readily available for review

  • Refund Policy (IndieGoGo Backers)

 

The DreamQii PlexiDrone Customer Support + Learning Center is here to ensure you have greater knowledge on PlexiDrone. Its modular and portable design enables you to buy upgrades and it is best to make a more well-informed decision before you order.
 

Everything you need to fly and film fits inside.  The PlexiPack is a comfortable, rugged and organized way to fly and film.  An elegant hard-shell backpack small enough to fit in an airplane’s overhead.  The PlexiPack HS sets the standard for portability in the camera drone industry. 

Learn more...

The PlexiHub Control System simplifies flying allowing you to focus on capturing beautiful aerial shots rather than fussing with complicated controls.  For a full list of features click here, 

Add a second PlexiHub CS to your order and receive free shipping worldwide!

 

 

 

8 High Performance Motors

6,000 g of Raw Thrust

 

 

Streamlined for Maximum Speed

 

 

Leading Edge Snap-fit Assembly
  

 

 

Production Ready!

Order Now and Save with Pre-Order pricing!  

Add a second PlexiDrone X8 to your order and receive free shipping worldwide!

story:
What happened?

I was doing a casual morning Facebook browse, and saw Kerry's status update. Just thinking about such a situation occuring to myself, made me cringe. 

What are we going to do?

Well, allow me to suggest:

  • If 100 of Kerry's friends, an easy number for a loveable gal, throw in 50-100$ each, that's a 5/10k right there.
  • We virtually throw in our digital money into this indiegogo.
  • We hopefully raise the money, to get this girl shooting again.

story:
Drones are amazing! But after the first few weeks of flying and aerial shooting, you start wondering if there is something more you can do with your drone. In that case, meet Drone Jacket, the perfect way to restart your drone experience.

 

 


 

 

 

 

  •   Cover case to apply over the drone body
  •   Attach gears and accessories using 1/4’’ screw

 

 

 

 

Drone Jacket Ph4 & MV2 can help you upgrade your DJI Phantom 4 and DJI Mavic 2 drones to Phantom 4 RTK and Mavic 2 Enterprise level at extremely affordable prices. With Drone Jacket, you can attach Measuring sensors/ 360 camera / Light Fixture / Mini Projector and many more to your drone.

 

Ph4

 

Mv2

 

 

With Drone Jacket, you can shoot spectacular panoramic videos by installing a 360° camera on top of Phantom4 / Mavic2. Click the video to check out the difference in the following video.

 

 

 

 

Drone Jacket will help you shoot vivid images with stunning quality even in cloudy days, near sunset, or when you are against by light by attaching a light fixture or spotlight to your drone.

 

 


 

 

 

Drones usually come in similar shapes and colors.

But with Drone Jacket, your drone will stand out the most.

Drone Jacket comes in many different colors, is easy and simple to use, and protects your drone. Customize your drone as you wish with your favorite color.

 



 


 

 

 


 

 

 

With Drone Jacket, you can fly with your favorite action figure.


 

 Simply attach an Adapte to Drone Jacket and your figurine is ready to fly up into the sky!

*Adapter available in add-on option



 

 

Ph4

 

Mv2

 

 

 

Drone Jacket (Phantom 4 / Mavic 2 Pro) + 1/4’’ screw

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Drone Jacket is ready to be shipped! The shipment will start once the campaign successfully ends. Early Bird / Indiegogo Special perks are expected to be delivered by April 2021. 

 

Shipment will start in January 2021 right after the campaign ends, and is expected to arrive at your home by April 2021. 

Update: (Dec.29th) Free Shopping to worldwide countries! 

 

 

 

 

Drone Jacket is designed for DJI Phantom 4 / Mavic 2 Pro model for the time being.

*Please note: The recommended weight for gears attached to Drone Jacket is less than 150g(0.33lb). Gears weighing more might affect the drone's performance.

 

 

  • HDI Lab builds and designs Drone User Experience.
  • Our mission is to further ‘Drone for FUN’
  • We innovate drone experience that anyone can experience and enjoy.

 

 

 

 

HDI Lab strives to make drones more accessible and enjoyable for everyone. After the initial excitement of flying and aerial shooting for some time, it’s easy to become bored with your drone, and soon enough, your drone might be sitting on your shelves for days. But we try to develop and innovate new ways to enjoy your drone even if you do not own professional drones. Our first step is Drone Jacket. Currently, Drone Jacket only supports DJI Phantom 4 and Mavic 2 model, but we plan to include more models and expand into other categories if we find enough support. Also, we are working hard to release more drone accessories and games to make your drone experience more enjoyable. Your support will greatly help us on our way.

 

 

Connect With us

story:
Visit our website to learn more about Spot and purchase.
Now available in 2 and 4-Packs!

Meet Spot, from iSmartAlarm

PC Mag - "This good-looking system is a snap to install, performs flawlessly, and has lots of room for expansion, which is a good thing since the folks at iSmartAlarm have all sorts of cool upgrades in the works."

CNET - "Truly a game changer.  Consumers who have long felt priced out of home security finally have a legitimate and affordable alternative."

Security Gem - "The system is beautiful and well designed and the pieces are discreet and complete.  I think I'm in love!"

Well, hello there!
Note: Spot does not move on it's own.  You can adjust the base up, down, left, right, and you can make Spot sit, stand, squat, or mount Spot on a wall.

Spot is a smart home camera, but WAY more than that.  Easy to use, packed with capabilities, and affordable.  Spot is your watchdog, your ears, your intercom, your link to your home, and your new family member. 

Flexible and versatile (and fun!)

Spot includes all of the features and options you need in a small, awesome package - Night vision, HD resolution streaming video, motion detection, audio detection, zoom, local video storage (up to 32 GB Micro SD) AND free cloud video storage, and 2-way audio. 

Spot introduces some amazing NEW features as well - Sound Recognition (with the ability to identify and notify of carbon monoxide and smoke alarm sirens), Time Lapse custom videos, and a simple setup (with audio walkthrough) in less than 3 minutes. With the magnetic mounting plate for wall mounting and twistable, turnable, expandable legs, Spot can capture any angle.



Spot’s patent-pending sound recognition algorithm will keep you informed of specific emergencies!  You don’t need to buy a new expensive smart home CO monitor or smoke alarm for every room in your house – Spot does all the work for you.

Here's how it works:

When your smoke alarm or carbon monoxide (CO) monitor are triggered, Spot will recognize the sounds they make and send you notifications telling you EXACTLY what the problem is (and which Spot is reporting the emergency).

In the future, we want to add additional sound recognition capabilities, such as glass breaking, a baby’s cry, and giraffe mating calls.



Time Lapse is an amazing new feature introduced with Spot. Capture an hour, a day, or a week’s worth of pictures and capture a lifetime in only a few minutes.  

Here’s how it works:

  • In the free app, schedule the start time and end time of your Time Lapse video
  • Choose how often you want Spot to snap a picture
  • Go!
Our CEO Raymond Meng's orchids bloom over multiple days (you can see the light change in the video) while he's hard at work - But he can watch them any time he wants with Spot's Time Lapse!

Shot Duration: 2 days, 13 hours, 58 minutes and 54 seconds
1 picture per minute

An entire day's worth of sun, clouds, and activity

You can capture a whole week’s worth of sunrises and sunsets. You can watch a plant grow and blossom (or die, I suppose). You can see exactly what your cat or dog (or fish or lizard or any other animal) do all day.  Best of all, you can share your amazing Time Lapse videos easily with your friends on Facebook, Twitter, Google+, and more.

And YES, the videos above and below are of REAL Time Lapse custom videos shot by Spots!

Can you Spot the thief?

Shot Duration: 8 hours, 34 minutes and 14 seconds

1 picture per minute

Listen to what is going on in your home, listen to each room individually, and talk to whomever you want - Whether it is passing a message to your wife or husband, telling the puppy to get off the couch, or telling a burglar that you are watching and recording. 2-Way Audio works perfectly as security, awareness, and a walkie-talkie all in one! 

The night is dark and full of terrors. Don’t be scared - Spot lights up the night.  With magical powers (and high strength LEDs), you can watch and record activity in even the lowest light.

Real night vision image from Spot of Jerry's living room. Who is Jerry? Our Senior Product Manager!

Watch your home from anywhere at any time with the free iSmartAlarm iPhone and Android apps (all you need to set up the app is your phone number).  HD streaming video lets you see what’s going on immediately. 

Spot offers free cloud video storage so you can automatically record and view events in case Spot is triggered by activity, sound and more.  Spot also has a MicroSD slot and can store up to 32 GB of video locally (MicroSD card not included)



  • Sound Recognition (patent-pending) - You can receive notifications if your smoke or CO alarm sirens are going off
  • Time Lapse custom videos - Create your own videos capturing hours and days in the blink of an eye
  • Free Cloud video storage
  • Local video storage (up to 32 GB MicroSD, not included)
  • 2-way audio
  • Easy magnetic mounting
  • Voice-guided audio setup
  • HD real-time streaming video
  • Night vision
  • 4x digital zoom
  • Motion detection
  • Sound detection
  • Flexible and adjustable legs for easy wall or table mounting
  • Free Android and iPhone apps (You can download the app and click "View Demo" on the login page to see how the App works)
  • Keep in mind that Spot needs to be plugged in to a normal US/CA AC outlet in order to do all of these things


  • Resolution: 1280 x 720 (720P)
  • Field of View: 130º lens
  • Image Sensor: 1/3” CMOS
  • Night Vision Distance: 30 feet
  • Video Format: H.264
  • Local Storage: up to 32 GB (MicroSD card not included)
  • Cloud Storage: Up to 30 10-second video clips rolling storage (first in first out)
  • Motion Detection Range: 20 feet
  • Audio: 2-Way Audio
  • Wi-Fi: 802.11 b/g/n 2.4GHz
  • Mounting Method: wall and table mounting
  • Ports: 1 Type-A USB, 1 micro USB
  • Dimension: 1.97” x 1.97” x 2.20” (50mm x 50mm x 56mm)
  • Weight: 3.53 oz (100g)
  • Power: DC 5V/1A Required
  • Power Cable Length: 6 feet
  • Operation Temperature: 32ºF ~ 104ºF (0ºC ~ 40ºC)
  • Operation Humidity: ≤ 90% at 104ºF (40ºC)
  • System Requirement: iOS 6.0 and higher, Android 4.0 and higher
  • User Information Required: Phone number
  • Bandwidth Requirement: upload speed 1Mbps

Free Cloud video storage 
Local video storage (up to 32 GB MicroSD, not included) 
2-way audio
Easy magnetic mounting 
Voice-guided audio setup 
HD real-time streaming video
Night vision
4x digital zoom 
Motion detection 
Sound detection 
Flexible and adjustable legs for easy wall or table mounting 
Free Android and iPhone apps (You can download the app and click "View Demo" on the login page to see how the App works)
Keep in mind that Spot needs to be plugged in to a normal US/CA AC outlet in order to do all of these things 













Resolution: 1280 x 720 (720P) 
Field of View: 130º lens 
Image Sensor: 1/3” CMOS 
Night Vision Distance: 30 feet 
Video Format: H.264 
Local Storage: up to 32 GB (MicroSD card not included) 
Cloud Storage: Up to 30 10-second video clips rolling storage (first in first out)

Motion Detection Range: 20 feet 
Audio: 2-Way Audio 
Wi-Fi: 802.11 b/g/n 2.4GHz 
Mounting Method: wall and table mounting 
Ports: 1 Type-A USB, 1 micro USB 
Dimension: 1.97” x 1.97” x 2.20” (50mm x 50mm x 56mm) 
Weight: 3.53 oz (100g) 
Power: DC 5V/1A Required
Power Cable Length: 6 feet 
Operation Temperature: 32ºF ~ 104ºF (0ºC ~ 40ºC) 
Operation Humidity: ≤ 90% at 104ºF (40ºC) 
System Requirement: iOS 6.0 and higher, Android 4.0 and higher
User Information Required: Phone number

Bandwidth Requirement: upload speed 1Mbps 








iSmart Alarm, Inc. was founded in Silicon Valley in 2012 on the 
principles of safety, beauty, and intelligence. We are pioneers and 
leaders in the best smartphone-enabled home security and home control 
system industry, with rave reviews from CNET, Digital Trends, PC Mag, 
and others.  The sleek, easy-to-use system utilizes a smartphone and 
tablet app to put home security and home control in the palm of its 
users' hands.  




We've built and run 3 crowdfunding campaigns on Indiegogo - We know what
 we're doing.  Our original campaign in 2013 launched the iSmartAlarm 
brand, and raised over 450% of our goal (and was the 7th highest 
technology campaign of all time at the time).  In 2014 we returned with 
the iCamera KEEP, and we succeeded in providing free cloud video storage
 and pan-tilt motorized controls to a market that was missing it.
iSmartAlarm products have won national and 
international awards including the CEA Mark of Excellence, Red Dot 
Product Design Award, and PC Mag’s Editor’s Choice Awards. The 
iSmartAlarm Home Security System was featured in Coldwell Banker’s “25 
Smart Home Technologies that Matter Most to Home Buyers.”  iSmartAlarm 
products are sold nationally and internationally in Best Buy, Amazon, 
Staples, Apple Stores online, and many more locations.
 

Visit iSmartAlarm.com for more information on our products





Spot is designed to work as a Wi-Fi smart home and 
security camera, and can also be linked with the iSmartAlarm Home 
Security System. The CubeOne™ acts as the brain and hub of the 
system, allowing iSmartAlarm devices and sensors to communicate back to 
the user through cloud technology.  
 Motion Detectors cover 
wide areas against intruders, Contact Sensors protect doors, windows, 
liquor cabinets and more, and the Smart Switch allow users to control 
electrical appliances and lights.  Intrusions or unauthorized activity 
will send a push notification, email, text message, and phone call to 
your family to make certain you can properly act if there is an 
emergency.  An intrusion when the system is armed also triggers the 
iSmartAlarm's 110 dB siren as well as act as a trigger to Spot to record
 activity.

story:
Terminus

Hi my name is Wesley Righetti I am a student at the Art Institute of California-San Francisco. Im majoring in Digital Filmmaking and Video Production. My project is about a young man who boards a train to visit his sister in the hospital after surviving a severe car accident. Along the way he experiences repressed memories and alternate realities. It is an experimental piece that focuses on the emotions of the main character as he goes through these repressed memories. This project is very important to me because it will be a showcasing of my cinematography skills that I've gained in the last two years. With your help we will be able to fund this project to pay our cast and crew as well as all the post production and distribution.

 

What We Need.

I've been working on this project for the past four months. I have poured my heart and soul into this project but it can only go so far. With your help, I will be able to pay my actors, my crew, my make up artists, as well as funding the post-production and distribution of my film to get it out there for everyone to see. Your help will go a long way to guaranteeing this film gets made. In return for your donations, we have a couple of great perks that involve things like DVD copies of the film, to private party invitations, to an Executive Producer credit on the film.

 

Thank You!

Share this campaign with your friends, your co-workers, anybody you know.  Post it on your Facebook wall. Tweet about it.  Instagram it, Snapchat it, Myspace it? I want to thank you for taking the time to read this. I want to thank you all for your help and contributions. I speak not only for myself but for my team when I say Thank you for your help.

story:
Short Summary

On December 21st, 2012 literally at the stroke of midnight, a band of thieves robbed me of all my camera equipment and posesssions while I was filming in Mexico. They absconded with approximately $6,000 worth of all of my equipment in addition to most of my cash, my harddrives, and other valuables. Even though the world didn't end, I've been dealing with my own personal apocalypse since 12.21.12. 

To make matters worse, the fine print scams of my insurance policyhave left me unable to lcaim this theft and be reimbursed by my policy. 

I am now completely CAMERA-LESS and am creating a fundraiser in hopes of generating the funds necessary to continue producing imagery and free & donation based photo shoots to members of our community and for the greatest possible good. 

What We Need & What You Get

Here is a list of all the items that were in the bag when it was stolen. As you can see... being a freelance photographer becomes quite expensive, very very fast.  This is the exact breakdown from B&H Photo as of 1.18.13.

SubTotal:$5,959.22
Sales Tax:$0.00
Discounted Shipping:Free
Order Total:$5,959.22

 

The Impact

If any of my images have ever moved you, touched you, inspired you, or changed your perspective on life; please consider this a sign as NOW as the opportunity support the continuation of the emotional transformation that my vision could provide for you, our communities, and possibly the entire world.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not in a place to financially support this cause, but you believe in your hearts about this cause, please:

*Hoot, holler, and create a lot of discussion about this cause. Please share with your friends and anyone who might love photography, art, or filmmaking!  

*If you or anyone you know has access to and wouldn't mind allowing me to borrow a Canon 5D II or similar styled camera / equipment , please let me know! 

 

And that’s all there is to it. I have faith and trust that everything is perfect order. I am surrounded by light, love, & absolutely amazing people. The universe conspires with our collective intentions and desires. This is a test and a learning experience. We shall all overcome!!!!

story:
Order here:

www.retoproject.com

 

RETO3D is small and lightweight, affordable and easy-to-use film camera. It has a built-in flash and it's film-saving! We are also developing an APP for users to make GIFs much easier, which resolves the complicated and time-consuming process of using PhotoShop.
Our aim is not to beat the old classics with an expensive, professional camera but one for everyone, even for beginners to use.

RETO3D | How A 3D Film Camera Wiggles The Moment 

  • 35mm Film - suitable for 35mm negatives and slides
  • Built-in Flash - enable you to photograph day and night
  • Film Reload - not just a one-go toy but your all-time favourite
  • Focus-free - quick snap creates a great form of art
  • Lightweight - turn it into your daily-life accessory
  • Easy-to-use - all photography lovers are welcomed
  • Affordable - a great gift for yourself and your loved ones
  • App Support - upload and stitch multiple images into 3D GIFs in a few seconds
  • Wiggle the Moment - go beyond a still, frozen picture 

Wiggle the Moment

TIC TOC TIC TOC… Time is always moving forward and it has been a forever dream for people to freeze a moment. We therefore invented cameras to capture precious memories, or to record a series of important events. Yet, we didn’t stop creating. We would like to go beyond and give excitement to a static photo. Only a 3D camera which carries a unique design can wiggle a still moment, giving a new life for 2D images. Especially in sports events - when the athlete jumps or the ball is kicked in the air - we desire to use it in capturing explosive motions. It is also suitable to shoot RETO3D in parties and concerts where a lot is happening, both foreground and background. 

 

 

How it works?

With our triple-lens system, RETO3D takes 3 half-frame images, with 3 different angles simultaneously. For a film roll with 36 exposures, users could get 24*3D images. Also, with our APP, it could help stitching the 3 images into 3D GIFs in a convenient and quick way. 

 

Specifications

  • Film Format: 35mm
  • Film Transport: Manual Wind and Rewind
  • Optical Lens: 30mm; f11; 3 Lens (Optical grade acrylic lenses)
  • Focusing: Focus-free; 1m to ∞
  • Shutter Release: 1/125s
  • Flash: Built-in
  • Power Supply: 1*AA Alkaline Battery
  • Main Plastic Material: ABS
  • Dimension: 133 (W) x 65 (H) x 42 (D) mm
  • Weight: 178±10g (Excluding Battery and Film) 

GIF-making App

Nowadays, it is almost everyone’s instant reaction to share their new photography work on social media. Rather than creating a 3D image using complicated video-editing softwares, we are developing a GIF-making App. Our triple-lens design simultaneously captures the same object with three slightly different angles. Three similar film pictures are therefore created. Once you upload the images to our App and choose a center point, the App could stitch the photos together to produce a very natural and smooth 3D GIF. We hope to shorten the time of making a good stereo image, giving a warm welcome to new joiners of RETO3D!

 

APP FUNCTIONS

***At this stage App support IOS only

Basic (FREE) : 

  • Make simple 3D GIFs 
  • Share your work on social media 
  • Save GIFs to your album 

In App Purchases : 

  • Remove watermark
  • Add special frames
  • Speed control of GIFs
  • More photo effect

Camera Prototype#1 Testing

 

Research & Development

In late 2016, we had the idea to create RETO3D and yet, it is easier said than done. It took us some intensive discussions to finally agree to actualize the dream. It also required a great courage to run the project, with the uncertainties ahead.

We first started some research and read about people's experiences on using old 3D cameras. Also, being consumers of those cameras ourselves, we were able to spot the possible improvements on the design. We decided to make RETO3D light and handy. We also believe in the attractiveness of having a built-in flash for night-time usage, and of course an App which makes a 3D GIF easily.

We have been working closely with our manufacturer, monitoring the production progress. In these 2 years, we have tested and modified several prototypes. We have tried on hundreds of different films. We have also selected the leather type which could give the best touch to the camera. 

Brief History

The earliest stage to view a three-dimensional photo was to use a stereoscope, which was invented in 1849. After a century, stereo photography had finally come to its era. Different designs of stereo cameras had been released since 1950s. Also, different types of 3D slide viewers and 3D glasses had been created. 

Lenticular printing dedicated to 3D-photo printing had started to gain popularity in 1980s, while stereo cameras with four lenses could also be seen. At that time, people sent their negatives to special laboratories in order to get their 3D images printed. The process however, usually took more than a month, and at a high cost. 3D film photography was only a trend among hobbyists. 

Todays, most 3D film cameras had ceased production, not to mention the difficulty in coming across a fully-functional one. Therefore, we decided to bring 3D film camera back to life, only to make it lighter and easier to use! We are also developing an App for easy creation of stereo GIFs. We are continuing the history of 3D camera step by step, providing a new experience to users!

Delivery

We ship worldwide. Import taxes and handling charges may apply to international orders. Under estimation, first-round shipping for Indiegogo will be in Aug 2019. We will work closely with manufacturers to make sure prompt delivery. We will surely keep you inform if there happens to be any unexpected delays.

RETO - REINVENT TOGETHER

Manufacturers ceased to produce many loving film cameras, leading to the pitiful absence of fully-functional ones in today’s market. Therefore, our team always holds a belief to reinvent film cameras! We simply hope to make film photography flourish again, by creating affordable, well-tailored cameras. Our first invention is RETO3D, a stereo camera which is lightweight and handy. However, it is impossible to make it come to life without your precious opinions and support. We will create more different cameras in the future, and we shall reinvent, together!

About RETO TEAM

We come from different backgrounds and yet we love 3D film photography. We make good use of our specialties - some members are good at graphics, product designs, camera designs and engineering while others help with communication and budget control. We all contribute to RETO3D! Our team has always been good listeners and we would like to hear your opinions.

story:
Forget all camera remotes you knew before. It is time for MIOPS MOBILE, the most versatile wireless camera remote ever! It combines the capabilities of your smartphone with your camera.    

MIOPS MOBILE is an exciting solution for DSLR or mirrorless camera owners looking to take amazing photos with the power of smartphone. MIOPS MOBILE connects to the shutter release port of your camera and communicates with your smartphone over Bluetooth. 

The MIOPS MOBILE app utilizes the smartphone's capabilities to offer creative trigger modes like Vibration, Sound, Motion and Distance or even various Timelapse modes to fire your camera remotely. It also provides basic shutter release modes like Press&Hold, Press&Lock, Timed Release, Self Timer and HDR. But the most extra ordinary feature is what we call "Scenario" mode which combines any of the available trigger options to create magic. Moreover, you can schedule your desired mode or sequence to fire at any time while you step back and enjoy your life.

 A few seconds of your time could make the difference in growing our community. We need your support to spread the word!

 

 

 

 

    

You can take photos with your DSLR or mirrorless camera using various modes within the MIOPS MOBILE smartphone app. Its refined user interface is easy to use and readily adjustable to fit your needs. Just select the desired mode and leave the control to your smartphone. It will fire your camera while you relax.

 

Even with the numerous triggering modes built into MIOPS MOBILE you might have something crazy in your imagination. So we have created the Scenario Mode which allows you to combine all of the modes plus other options like trigger delay, to create the scenario of your dreams. MIOPS MOBILE will execute the steps of your scenario to make your dream images come to life. Moreover, you can schedule it to any time. Truly exceptional.

We have created the MOTION mode which uses your smartphone camera to watch for the action. It has never been so easy to capture anything that moves. You can use this mode to take photos of wild animals, intruders or capture the kids excitement during an epic pool leap!

 

MIOPS MOBILE can also sense vibrations by accessing your smartphone’s gyroscope and accelerometer. Fix your smartphone to basketball pole and capture your best slam dunk. MIOPS MOBILE will not miss that incredible moment. Or just shake your smartphone to take a picture… That's it!

 

Your smartphone has a lot of sophisticated sensors and hardware inside, and MIOPS MOBILE uses them to boost your creativity. The onboard microphone is capable of capturing crisp clear voice, so we decided to use it to capture sound events. It works like a charm. Have you ever seen yourself while screaming?

 

If you own a MIOPS MOBILE, you don't have to settle for ordinary timelapse modes. Long Exposure Timelapse gives you the opportunity to capture exposures up to 99 minutes in duration. Bulb Ramping Timelapse makes light transitions possible by seamlessly changing exposures from beginning to the end. You have HDR and timelapse modes, so why not combine them? Imagine a timelapse video where every frame is an HDR photo? With HDR Timelapse mode your timelapse videos will reveal more shadow and highlight detail than ever. 

With the RoadLapse mode, one of the best ways to leverage your phone’s GPS data, MIOPS MOBILE takes full advantage of this technology by firing the shutter over predetermined distances.

MIOPS MOBILE offers far more functionality than a standard cable release. Its six different cable release modes put you in command of the shutter. You can release it with a single touch, keep the shutter open as long as you want, or set a timer to release the shutter. Press&Lock, Press&Hold as well as the Timed Release functions will turn Star Trail photography into a piece of cake.

 

MIOPS MOBILE is equipped with Bluetooth 4.0 technology for low power consumption. It comes with a rechargeable battery that will last for 24+ hours. You can automatically and wirelessly upgrade the device’s firmware. The app will be available for both Android and iOS. The app and firmware upgrades will be completely free forever!


If your camera has a shutter release port, chances are it’s supported by MIOPS MOBILE. Major brand models from Canon, Nikon, Sony, Panasonic, Samsung, Olympus, Hasselblad and Fujifilm are all supported. The total list includes more than 350 models. If you own multiple cameras, you can simply change the connection cable, ensuring this investment delivers for years.     

  

 

The vast capabilities of MIOPS MOBILE are packed into a slim and modern design measuring just 63x39x14 mm. It has a single power button on the side, and the camera and USB connections are also conveniently located. MIOPS MOBILE is only about the size of your camera's battery, so it will take up very little space in your bag.    

 

 

 

 

 
We have passed almost all of our critical milestones. Now we need your help to clear off the remaining items.
 

 

Two years ago, we have successfully completed our first Kickstarter campaign for the popular MIOPS Smart Trigger. Thanks to the great support of our backers, we have delivered almost 2000 units worldwide and now we are back with MIOPS MOBILE. We think that our new product will fill a gap in the photography accessories market. With your support, we can take MIOPS MOBILE from prototype to production. By being a part of the project, you can actually have the wireless camera remote with the features you have always wanted. Plus, we’re always open to new ideas that can help you realize your creative vision. If you have anything in your mind, just tell us. We will listen and work to add the most wanted features to MIOPS MOBILE.

Full resolution photos and the Press Kit can be found in the Dropbox link below:
story_txt:
Forget all camera remotes you knew before. It is time for MIOPS MOBILE, the most versatile wireless camera remote ever! It combines the capabilities of your smartphone with your camera.    MIOPS MOBILE is an exciting solution for DSLR or mirrorless camera owners looking to take amazing photos with the power of smartphone. MIOPS MOBILE connects to the shutter release port of your camera and communicates with your smartphone over Bluetooth. 

The MIOPS MOBILE app utilizes the smartphone's capabilities to offer creative trigger modes like Vibration, Sound, Motion and Distance or even various Timelapse modes to fire your camera remotely. It also provides basic shutter release modes like Press&Hold, Press&Lock, Timed Release, Self Timer and HDR. But the most extra ordinary feature is what we call "Scenario" mode which combines any of the available trigger options to create magic. Moreover, you can schedule your desired mode or sequence to fire at any time while you step back and enjoy your life.

 A few seconds of your time could make the difference in growing our community. We need your support to spread the word!
 
 
 
 
 

     
You can take photos with your DSLR or mirrorless camera using various modes within the MIOPS MOBILE smartphone app. Its refined user interface is easy to use and readily adjustable to fit your needs. Just select the desired mode and leave the control to your smartphone. It will fire your camera while you relax.

 

Even with the numerous triggering modes built into MIOPS MOBILE you might have something crazy in your imagination. So we have created the Scenario Mode which allows you to combine all of the modes plus other options like trigger delay, to create the scenario of your dreams. MIOPS MOBILE will execute the steps of your scenario to make your dream images come to life. Moreover, you can schedule it to any time. Truly exceptional.

We have created the MOTION mode which uses your smartphone camera to watch for the action. It has never been so easy to capture anything that moves. You can use this mode to take photos of wild animals, intruders or capture the kids excitement during an epic pool leap!

 

MIOPS MOBILE can also sense vibrations by accessing your smartphone’s gyroscope and accelerometer. Fix your smartphone to basketball pole and capture your best slam dunk. MIOPS MOBILE will not miss that incredible moment. Or just shake your smartphone to take a picture… That's it!

 

Your smartphone has a lot of sophisticated sensors and hardware inside, and MIOPS MOBILE uses them to boost your creativity. The onboard microphone is capable of capturing crisp clear voice, so we decided to use it to capture sound events. It works like a charm. Have you ever seen yourself while screaming?

 

If you own a MIOPS MOBILE, you don't have to settle for ordinary timelapse modes. Long Exposure Timelapse gives you the opportunity to capture exposures up to 99 minutes in duration. Bulb Ramping Timelapse makes light transitions possible by seamlessly changing exposures from beginning to the end. You have HDR and timelapse modes, so why not combine them? Imagine a timelapse video where every frame is an HDR photo? With HDR Timelapse mode your timelapse videos will reveal more shadow and highlight detail than ever. 


With the RoadLapse mode, one of the best ways to leverage your phone’s GPS data, MIOPS MOBILE takes full advantage of this technology by firing the shutter over predetermined distances.

MIOPS MOBILE offers far more functionality than a standard cable release. Its six different cable release modes put you in command of the shutter. You can release it with a single touch, keep the shutter open as long as you want, or set a timer to release the shutter. Press&Lock, Press&Hold as well as the Timed Release functions will turn Star Trail photography into a piece of cake.

 

MIOPS MOBILE is equipped with Bluetooth 4.0 technology for low power consumption. It comes with a rechargeable battery that will last for 24+ hours. You can automatically and wirelessly upgrade the device’s firmware. The app will be available for both Android and iOS. The app and firmware upgrades will be completely free forever!


If your camera has a shutter release port, chances are it’s supported by MIOPS MOBILE. Major brand models from Canon, Nikon, Sony, Panasonic, Samsung, Olympus, Hasselblad and Fujifilm are all supported. The total list includes more than 350 models. If you own multiple cameras, you can simply change the connection cable, ensuring this investment delivers for years.     
     

 

The vast capabilities of MIOPS MOBILE are packed into a slim and modern design measuring just 63x39x14 mm. It has a single power button on the side, and the camera and USB connections are also conveniently located. MIOPS MOBILE is only about the size of your camera's battery, so it will take up very little space in your bag.    

 

 

 

 


 We have passed almost all of our critical milestones. Now we need your help to clear off the remaining items. 

 

Two years ago, we have successfully completed our first Kickstarter campaign for the popular MIOPS Smart Trigger. Thanks to the great support of our backers, we have delivered almost 2000 units worldwide and now we are back with MIOPS MOBILE. We think that our new product will fill a gap in the photography accessories market. With your support, we can take MIOPS MOBILE from prototype to production. By being a part of the project, you can actually have the wireless camera remote with the features you have always wanted. Plus, we’re always open to new ideas that can help you realize your creative vision. If you have anything in your mind, just tell us. We will listen and work to add the most wanted features to MIOPS MOBILE.

Full resolution photos and the Press Kit can be found in the Dropbox link below:

story:
Hi everyone!

You all know that I love taking pictures and that my Nikon D60 is usually glued to my side wherever I go. With the birth of my son Jude and the holidays approaching, I am giddy with excitement over pictures yet to come! Unfortunately, my fancy camera just bit the dust and fixing it would cost just as much as biting a chunk out of a new one. And there's no way I can afford a new one right now by myself. SO...

I'm running a quick 7-day fundraising campaign for a new one! I'd like to purchase a new camera by the time I go home to Buffalo in 4 weeks (family wedding and early Christmas!) So there are just 7 days to spread the word and raise funds. If you help me raise the money for the camera, I'll take your picture with it!

Having a new camera will continue to allow me to capture life as I see it. And life is so enticing right now :)

The camera I plan to buy is either a Nikon D3200 or the D5100, and it costs about $500.

Any money raised over my goal will be put towards the cost of the lens I've been wanting for years: the Nikkor 18-200mm.

Thank you SO MUCH in advance for helping me!

story:
I'm setting this up knowing that I will probably sound like a charity case, but I'm totally okay with that. I've already gone through all of the appropriate channels to try and resolve this without flat out begging.

I've recently had all of my professional quality camera equipment stolen from my apartment.  

I used to do photography professionally with my own LLC, Lollyography.  I had decided to put that on hiatus while I transitioned into Portland life.  I recently went to dust off the equipment and prepare for my first session in PDX and noticed that everything was gone.  $3-4k worth of gear was taken right out from under me.  Womp, womp.  

So, I thought I would reach out to ya'll to see if anybody would be willing to donate a buck or two.  Consider it my birthday present (I turn 30 next week).  All donations will go directly to purchasing back all of my equipment so I can start shooting again.  Not only will this help me earn extra income, but it'll save my sanity as I need a creative outlet in life and photography is a huge passion of mine.

As a thank you, anyone who donates will receive a personal thank you note and small print from me which I'll create with my new equipment.  
I love you all.

story:
If you're reading this, you probably know me and my story. You know that I had my dream of getting a full-frame DSLR fulfilled last May. You probably also know that last November, the mirror fell out and I had to have it fixed, luckily for free.

 

What you may not know is that all DSLRs have a lifespan of shutter clicks. The lifespan of my 5D is said to be 100,000. Last November Canon told me I was at 67,000. I then calculated that I take 10,000 photos every four months. Twelve months later, I am probably nearing that 100,000 mark and the death of my camera. 

 

I could send it to Canon and have the shutter replaced for $250 or so. But it's a six year old camera that's been updated twice. The technology has improved so much, particularly in the department of low-light sensitivity. Low-light sensitivity is so so key to my concert photography. So I figure it makes far more sense to upgrade. And I'd like to do so while my current camera is still working. Additionally, for a while now I've been wishing that photos could capture the sound of the music - and then reminding myself that such a thing as video exists. With the 5D mark II, I could capture sound with image! Start shooting video at shows! Make music videos!

 

The clincher: photography is my job. My parents are generous and pay for school and housing, but drew the line at paying for my cameras. All four DSLRs that I have had over the past five years I bought with money I somehow scratched up. Fun fact: the first (in 2008) was a 2001 Canon D30 that now goes for a whole $66 on KEH.com.

 

In comes this fundraiser. In essence, it just streamlines what I've been doing anyway: selling prints and taking photos of people and bands. I'm trying to get a lightly used Canon 5D mark II and a couple batteries. Not a mark III, no fancy L lenses (but if perhaps I raise enough...!) I've already saved up some money, so my goal is the deficit.

 

You may pick prints from my website: www.skeletonkeyphotography.com (or facebook, or even tumblr)

story:
Photography is as "me" as my red hair.  Please help me continue my passion.

I decided I wanted to be a photographer when I was six years old. My sister was working on a photo project for school and the two of us ventured down our dried up creek bed so she could find some neat shots. I remember her telling me to point to things I wanted her to photograph and after helping her with a few photos, I was hooked. I had found my passion before I even picked up a camera.

Now fast forward eight and a half years later through various cameras, lots of learning, and plenty of donut making later ((but not eating, ew. :p)), and fourteen year old me bought Magritte, my wonderful first SLR camera.

He has been by my side through more adventures than I can count over the past seven and a half years, but now he is very old and frail. Unfortunately he gets too tired to stay awake through a whole photoshoot and does not like to cooperate much anymore. It is time to let him retire, and that is why I need your help. <3


You help me, and you get cool art in return!!

The camera I am saving up for is the Canon 5D Mark iii. This camera does everything I need to continue my passion and start new ones. My fiance and I have many video projects planned that are waiting for the HD video capabilities that this amazing camera provides. ((Magritte is a bit too old to understand what I mean when I mention video on an SLR...))  Unfortunately over the years, two of his limbs have gotten over used as well. Because of this, I will also need to get the Canon 50mm f/1.4 lens and the Canon 24-105mm lens.

If you help me get my camera, you get awesome prints of my artwork in return!! :D
You can chose from any photo on my website, www.sproutingvisions.com

Your Impact

If you help me raise enough money for my camera, I can do paid photoshoots again, progress on personal projects, and you can help me start my career in the artist world. Yay!! This means you get get to see many more photos from yours truly.

Want to help but don't have spare money?

Please spread this link around to everyone you know. Post it on all your social media sites ((use the Indiegogo share tools!)), call up your Aunt Petunia that you haven't talked to in awhile, tell your mail man or woman, hell, even tell your dog just so he feels including. Anything and everything helps, thank you so much for taking the time to read this. You rock. :]

story:
Hello. My name is Hai-Ho Tran. I am a photographer, specialized in weddings, environmental portraiture and travel photography.

I am planning to work on a photography project that is very dear to my heart.  I'll return to SAPA, a small village near the border of China and Vietnam, where there are still many different ethnic minorities with their culture, art, customs still preserved and flourish. My hope is to document the way of life of different tribes and how such way of life is being affected by tourism and cultural assimilation through photographic images. I would like to be an advocate for sustainable development and eco-travel efforts in SAPA.  You can read more about this project here and see my photos of SAPA here.

As I have out grown my old limited functionality camera, I sold it a year ago.  I am in the process of fund raising for a new camera system.  I hope you can help me accomplish this by hiring me for your next photography needs, purchasing my photos online or directly donate through my PayPal Account [hai_ho@hotmail.com].

Here are some of the ways that you can assist me as an individual or organization. You can purchase an advanced voucher and in return I’ll do that portrait session, cover a wedding or your organization’s future events. These vouchers/photos also make great gifts: Birthday, Anniversary, Christmas, etc… You can donate by purchasing a one on one point-and-shoot camera lesson session in which we will go over basic photography techniques and how to make the best out of your camera. Or you can simply donate in exchange for some of my landscape prints from my web page => www.haihophotos.com

You can also help by sharing this post on your social networks or use Indiegogo’s sharing tools. 

My goal is to buy all of the necessary equipement(one camera body, four lens, 2 flashes) but if my goal doesn't reach I can just buy the basic camera and two needed lens that would be around $5,000.  Rent the rest of the equipment when needed.

 

Thank you so much for your support!

Hai-Ho Tran

haihotran@gmail.com

(408)464.8633

story:
What is XtremeTether?

XtremeTether is a sophisticated WIRELESS DSLR camera remote control tethering system, that takes tethered photography to an extreme level.

XtremeTether plugs into your DSLR cameras USB port, giving you a full wireless remote control tether using an app in your iPad, MAC (iPhone, Windows , Android soon).



XtremeTether helps make your life easier by giving you total wireless tethering remote control of your camera, and helps you get those tricky shots that were hard to get, by allowing you to place your camera where you couldn’t before and still be able to control it, wirelessly.

XtremeTether saves you money by including a lot of features in one device.

XtremeTether is useful for:
  • Underwater, Studio, Portraits, Landscape, Out door, Wildlife
  • High-speed Photography
  • Time Lapse, Astronomy, HDR, Panoramic,
  • Photo Shoot, Stop Motion, Videos, Night
  • Pole/Aerial shots
  • Sporting Events, Action Shots, Church, Stadiums, Weddings
  • Macro Photography, Trick Photography, Special Effects
  • Commercial, Architectural / Real Estate
  • Motion Control Or Map Generation
  • Remote Photography
  • Attach camera outside a moving vehicle/plane and easily control it remotely

The cameras hot shoe is NOT used by XtremeTether, allowing you to still be able to attach your flash or other camera accessories. It can be mounted using the hot shoe as a holder, placed in your pocket, or in a pouch.

  • This one device works with many different cameras.
  • Also full control of your DSLR camera remotely over the internet (even pan/tilt, live view, change settings, record videos etc)

XtremeTether Wireless Features

  • See live video stream of cameras viewfinder remotely from the app
  • Remotely change almost any camera setting (ISO, WB, Shutter, exposure, etc)
  • Trigger the camera to take pictures from app
  • Images instantly uploaded from camera wirelessly and shown in app while shooting
  • Browse/Delete/Upload files/movies/folders on card inside camera, wirelessly from the app
  • Start or stop movie recording from the app
  • Record videos even if your camera does NOT have video recording capability
  • Monitor movie being recorded remotely from the app
  • Focus the camera from the app
  • Self-Timer
  • Photo Sharing
  • Create custom albums to store images as they are automatically uploaded
  • Adds GPS coordinates to images
  • Remotely tells you how much charge is on camera battery

  • Bulb ramping, or ramp any camera setting.

  • Infinity Mode: Keep taking pictures without running out of camera memory
  • Interval-o-meter: Time lapse, HDR, Bracketing, Bulb, Stacking
  • Motion Detection: Automatically wait for motion in viewfinder then take picture
  • Scripting: BASIC programming language with extensions for photography and camera control, allows you to make custom scripts to automatically take pictures, bracket any setting not just exposure, change settings, start/stop movie recording, pan/tilt camera, read light intensity, or control motion detection, bulb ramping, ramp any setting, HDR, change focus, stacking etc.
  • Scripts run on the hardware: Mobile device does not have to be connected while running long scripts.
  • 150 built in photo effects: Adjust color temperature, exposure, image enhancement/overlay/combine, red-eye, motion blur, adjust color saturation, tint, vignette, false color, sharpen, fish-eye effects, and lots more.

XTremeTether Cable Accessory Kit

  • Built in Microprocessor inside the cable
  • Wireless Remote Motorized PANNING AND TILTING of DSLR camera allows for panoramic or motion timelapse pictures. Pan tilt requires Bescor MP-101/360 motorized pan/tilt head (not included). Our cable makes panning and tilting wireless and controllable from XtremeTether.
  • Experimental follow feature: Automatically pans or tilts the camera to follow you as you move about in the viewfinder.
  • 4 Channel high-speed triggering: 4 sensor Inputs trigger a combination of 4 flashes or cameras. Trigger sensors: light, sound, motion, laser, or your own custom trigger.


XtremeTether Hardware Specs:

  • Built in 802.11 b/g/n WiFi Access Point (generates own WiFi hot spot)
  • 150 Mbyte/sec wireless data rate
  • 150+ ft wireless range
  • USB 2.0 at 480Mbits/sec
  • Repeater mode can wirelessly connect to your existing wireless network
  • Built in battery and charger
  • Built in Ethernet connector
  • Battery lasts 4 to 8 hrs depending on use

XtremeTether shown with accessory cable



Wireless Accessory Cable Kit (high speed trigger and motorized Pan/Tilt)


How it works

While you shoot, images are automatically transmitted from the camera to your MAC or mobile device (iPhone, iPad, Android,etc). The full resolution images are instantly displayed on a much bigger screen, helping you or your clients see the real images,  reducing expensive time consuming re-shoots. You can shoot from the camera itself, or remotely from the app.


iPad App images show below, MAC version works the same way.

Change Camera settings wirelessly from the app

Focus the camera remotely from the app

View folders files pictures movies that are on the camera card remotely from appTimelapse Menu, looking up a camera setting to use for HDR below

Scripting (below)

Automatic panning and tilting follows subject as they move about (below)Imaging effects (below)

Image gallery, automatically sorted by custom albums and dates.


Wireless Motorized Panning and Tilting

Using your own low cost Bescor MP-101 or MP-360 motorized pan/tilt head, plus our accessory cable, you can wirelessly pan and tilt your DSLR camera remotely while still seeing a live wireless view of your cameras viewfinder, and having full wireless control of your camera. No more running back and forth to change where your camera is pointing, just do it remotely from your easy chair wirelessly using the app.

Combine panning and tilting with scripts and intervalometer to take great panoramic, HDR, and time-lapse photos. Control pan/tilt speeds along with variable acceleration and deceleration for smooth motion.

Here is a quick demo of Pan/Tilt in action:

Time Lapse with Pan and Tilt

Combine motorized pan and tilt with scripting to create time lapse videos.




High Speed Triggering

The XtremeTether accessory cable with a built in micro-processor, also has built in high speed triggering capability. You can trigger using sound, light, motion, laser, or use your own custom triggering device. There are 4 independent channels so you can have 4 trigger sensor inputs, that can trigger a combination of four flashes or cameras at the same time. Programmable trigger delays, auto re-arm, pre-arm, selectable signal trigger edge, trigger levels, and high or low output polarity for each channel.

Low cost Arduino Sound Sensor

With trigger delay


Above video shows high-speed photography using a simple arduino sound sensor. The sound from the clapping, balloon popping, or glass breaking is detected by the sound sensor and XtremeTether Accessory Cable, triggering the flash, taking the picture.


Scripting using BASIC

XtremeTether's BASIC programming language with added extensions for photography and camera control, allows you to develop your own scripts to control the camera. Scripts can be shared with other photographers. Scripts allow you to take pictures, read any camera settings into a script variable, make decisions on that variable, pan and tilt the camera, create your own intervalometer, or your own version of time lapse, read light intensity, check for motion in the view finder, start or stop movie recordings, ramp or change any camera setting, and lots more. The scripts run on the hardware itself, so you don’t have to tie up  your iPhone, iPad or computer while you run long scripts.

Built in Scripts are included for time lapse, HDR photography, and time lapse with panning and tilting. You can add as many of you own scripts as you want, or share scripts with other photographers so they can join in the fun too!

Scripting gives you almost limitless extensibility because you can add new features just by adding your own scripts or pasting one from a friend or from the internet.

example script:

ShutterSpeed=ReadCameraParameter("shutterSpeed")

If ShutterSpeed>0.5 THEN SetCameraParameter("whitebalance","cloudy")

FOR I=0 TO 10

GOSUB TakePicture

PanTilt(144,90,255,70) // pan speed, tilt speed, acceleration, deceleration

Delay(1.0)

PanTilt(0,0,255,255) // stop panning

ShutterSpeed=ShutterSpeed + 0.5 // ramp shutter speed

SetCameraParameter("shutterspeed",ShutterSpeed)

WaitForMotion(50,1.5) // waits for the image to change by 50% before continuing

NEXT I

SetCameraParameter("movie","1") // start recording a video

PanTilt(50,0,255,255) // pan slowly while recording the video

Delay(30) // pan and record for 30 seconds

PanTilt(0,0,255,255) // stop panning

SetCameraParameter("movie","0") // stop recording the video

Here is a quick video showing how to create a simple script that pans and takes a few pictures. This video actually shows the old version, the new version is much better.




150 Built in Photo Editing Effects

Touch up your photos with over 150 image processing functions built right into the  app itself. For example: adjust tint, color temperature, straighten images, adjust the color or saturation, exposure, contrast, false color, vignette, fish-eye, red-eye correction, including many other digital special effects:


The above YouTube video is not very clear, setting it to HD mode looks a tiny bit better.


HDR Photography

XtremeTether allows you to use scripts to achieve unlimited levels of bracketing. You can bracket almost any setting, not only exposure.



Which Cameras Are Supported

The features listed are camera dependent, not all features are available for all cameras (it depends on the capability of your particular camera).

Nikon:

D7000, D700, D90, CoolPix, D300, D200, D800, D3, D3s, D800e, D40, D50, D300s, D60, D70, D80, D2xxx, D4, D7100, J2, D600, D5200, D5100, D2Hs, D3100, D3000, D5000, D3X


Canon:

EOS 7D, EOS 60D, EOS Rebel XSi,  T4i,  T3i,  T2i,  T1i,  XTi,  500D,  550D,  EOS 450D,  EOS 50D,  Powershot,  EOS 5D Mark II,  EOS 5D Mark III,  EOS 1D Mark IV,  EOS 1D Mark III,  EOS 1D Mark II,  EOS 20D,  EOS 350D,  EOS 40D,  EOS 700D,  EOS 100D,  EOS M,  EOS 650D,  EOS 6D, EOS 600D,  EOS 1100D,  EOS 10D, IXUS 90IS


Where are we now in the development

Hot and Ready to go for iPad and MAC versions.

  • Embedded Linux software inside XtremeTether transmitter is complete
  • XtremeTether hardware from OEM manufacturer is FCC certified already.
  • High speed triggering hardware/software for accessory cable is complete
  • Wireless Pan / Tilt software for Bescor MP-101/360 accessory cable is complete
  • iPad version of the app is complete
  • MAC version of the app is complete


What will we do with the money?

With the funds we will be able to:

1. Get some help to create software for Android and Windows PC/Mobile.

2. Add more features as suggested by YOU!

Stretch Goals:

1. Create a better looking housing for the Accessory (Pan/Tilt/High Speed) Cable

2. Add support for more cameras (select Nikon and Canon are currently supported). Its expensive to test the software with many different cameras, because DSLR cameras are very expensive easily over $1000 each not including the lens.


Production Time Line

The main hardware is already manufactured, and FCC certified by a reputable reliable OEM manufacturer who has already manufactured and shipped literally millions devices to consumers.

Estimated Timeline:

  • Nov 2013: Already able to ship iPad and MAC version now
  • Dec 2013: Indiegogo campaign
  • Jan 2014: Port app to Android 
  • Feb 2014: Port app to Windows

Our Team:

We have over 10 years software end electronics design experience, and have developed many products in the past.


Risks and challenges 

Every project has risks, however, the bulk of the risk is reduced because all the hardware is already completed and manufactured by a reputable reliable long time hardware manufacturer.

The other risk is software, we have already completed the MAC and iPad version.  The risk is minimized because most of the work needed is just porting the code from one platform to another.

We will keep you posted every step of the way.

Please help us by supporting our dream of taking wireless DSLR camera tethering to the extreme with XtremeTether
story_txt:
What is XtremeTether?XtremeTether is a sophisticated WIRELESS DSLR camera remote control tethering system, that takes tethered photography to an extreme level. 
XtremeTether plugs into your DSLR cameras USB port, giving you a full wireless remote control tether using an app in your iPad, MAC (iPhone, Windows , Android soon).


XtremeTether helps make your life 
easier by giving you total wireless tethering remote control of your camera, and 
helps you get those tricky shots that were hard to get, by allowing you 
to place your camera where you couldn’t before and still be able to 
control it, wirelessly.XtremeTether saves you money by including a 
lot of features in one device.XtremeTether is useful for: 
Underwater, Studio, Portraits, Landscape, Out door, Wildlife
High-speed Photography
Time Lapse, Astronomy, HDR, Panoramic, 
Photo Shoot, Stop Motion, Videos, Night
Pole/Aerial shots
Sporting Events, Action Shots, Church, Stadiums, Weddings
Macro Photography, Trick Photography, Special Effects
Commercial, Architectural / Real Estate
Motion Control Or Map Generation
Remote Photography
Attach camera outside a moving vehicle/plane and easily control it remotely
The cameras hot shoe is NOT used by XtremeTether, allowing you to still be able to attach your flash or other camera accessories. It can be mounted using the hot shoe as a holder, placed in your pocket, or in a pouch.
This one device works with many different cameras.

Also full control of your DSLR camera remotely over the internet (even pan/tilt, live view, change settings, record videos etc)

XtremeTether Wireless Features
See live video stream of cameras viewfinder remotely from the app

Remotely change almost any camera setting (ISO, WB, Shutter, exposure, etc)
Trigger the camera to take pictures from app
Images instantly uploaded from camera wirelessly and shown in app while shooting
Browse/Delete/Upload files/movies/folders on card inside camera, wirelessly from the app
Start or stop movie recording from the app
Record videos even if your camera does NOT have video recording capability
Monitor movie being recorded remotely from the app
Focus the camera from the app
Self-Timer
Photo Sharing
Create custom albums to store images as they are automatically uploaded 

Adds GPS coordinates to images

Remotely tells you how much charge is on camera battery

Bulb ramping, or ramp any camera setting.


Infinity Mode: Keep taking pictures without running out of camera memory

Interval-o-meter: Time lapse, HDR, Bracketing, Bulb, Stacking

Motion Detection: Automatically wait for motion in viewfinder then take picture

Scripting: BASIC programming language with extensions for photography and camera control, allows you to make custom scripts to automatically take pictures, bracket any setting not just exposure, change settings, start/stop movie recording, pan/tilt camera, read light intensity, or control motion detection, bulb ramping, ramp any setting, HDR, change focus, stacking etc.

Scripts run on the hardware: Mobile device does not have to be connected while running long scripts.

150 built in photo effects: Adjust color temperature, exposure, image enhancement/overlay/combine, red-eye, motion blur, adjust color saturation, tint, vignette, false color, sharpen, fish-eye effects, and lots more.
XTremeTether Cable Accessory Kit

Built in Microprocessor inside the cable


Wireless Remote Motorized PANNING AND TILTING of DSLR camera allows for panoramic or motion timelapse pictures. Pan tilt requires Bescor MP-101/360 motorized pan/tilt head (not included). Our cable makes panning and tilting wireless and controllable from XtremeTether.

Experimental follow feature: Automatically pans or tilts the camera to follow you as you move about in the viewfinder.

4 Channel high-speed triggering: 4 sensor Inputs trigger a combination of 4 flashes or cameras. Trigger sensors: light, sound, motion, laser, or your own custom trigger.

XtremeTether Hardware Specs:
Built in 802.11 b/g/n WiFi Access Point (generates own WiFi hot spot)

150 Mbyte/sec wireless data rate
150+ ft wireless range
USB 2.0 at 480Mbits/sec
Repeater mode can wirelessly connect to your existing wireless network

Built in battery and charger
Built in Ethernet connector

Battery lasts 4 to 8 hrs depending on use

XtremeTether shown with accessory cable






Wireless Accessory Cable Kit (high speed trigger and motorized Pan/Tilt)




How it works
While you shoot, images are automatically transmitted from the camera to your MAC or mobile device (iPhone, iPad, Android,etc). The full resolution images are instantly displayed on a much bigger screen, helping you or your clients see the real images,  reducing expensive time consuming re-shoots. You can shoot from the camera itself, or remotely from the app.iPad App images show below, MAC version works the same way.

Change Camera settings wirelessly from the app


Focus the camera remotely from the app

View folders files pictures movies that are on the camera card remotely from appTimelapse Menu, looking up a camera setting to use for HDR below
Scripting (below)

Automatic panning and tilting follows subject as they move about (below)Imaging effects (below)

Image gallery, automatically sorted by custom albums and dates.

Wireless Motorized Panning and TiltingUsing your own low cost Bescor MP-101 or MP-360 motorized pan/tilt head, plus our accessory cable, you can wirelessly pan and tilt your DSLR camera remotely while still seeing a live wireless view of your cameras viewfinder, and having full wireless control of your camera. No more running back and forth to change where your camera is pointing, just do it remotely from your easy chair wirelessly using the app.Combine panning and tilting with scripts and intervalometer to take great panoramic, HDR, and time-lapse photos. Control pan/tilt speeds along with variable acceleration and deceleration for smooth motion.Here is a quick demo of Pan/Tilt in action:Time Lapse with Pan and TiltCombine motorized pan and tilt with scripting to create time lapse videos.High Speed TriggeringThe XtremeTether accessory cable with a built in micro-processor, also has built in high speed triggering capability. You can trigger using sound, light, motion, laser, or use your own custom triggering device. There are 4 independent channels so you can have 4 trigger sensor inputs, that can trigger a combination of four flashes or cameras at the same time. Programmable trigger delays, auto re-arm, pre-arm, selectable signal trigger edge, trigger levels, and high or low output polarity for each channel.Low cost Arduino Sound Sensor




With trigger delay

Above video shows high-speed photography using a simple arduino sound sensor. The sound from the clapping, balloon popping, or glass breaking is detected by the sound sensor and XtremeTether Accessory Cable, triggering the flash, taking the picture.Scripting using BASIC
XtremeTether's BASIC programming language with added extensions for photography and camera control, allows you to develop your own scripts to control the camera. Scripts can be shared with other photographers. Scripts allow you to take pictures, read any camera settings into a script variable, make decisions on that variable, pan and tilt the camera, create your own intervalometer, or your own version of time lapse, read light intensity, check for motion in the view finder, start or stop movie recordings, ramp or change any camera setting, and lots more. The scripts run on the hardware itself, so you don’t have to tie up  your iPhone, iPad or computer while you run long scripts.
Built in Scripts are included for time lapse, HDR photography, and time lapse with panning and tilting. You can add as many of you own scripts as you want, or share scripts with other photographers so they can join in the fun too!
Scripting gives you almost limitless extensibility because you can add new features just by adding your own scripts or pasting one from a friend or from the internet.


example script:
ShutterSpeed=ReadCameraParameter("shutterSpeed")
If ShutterSpeed>0.5 THEN SetCameraParameter("whitebalance","cloudy")
FOR I=0 TO 10
GOSUB TakePicture
PanTilt(144,90,255,70) // pan speed, tilt speed, acceleration, deceleration
Delay(1.0)
PanTilt(0,0,255,255) // stop panning
ShutterSpeed=ShutterSpeed + 0.5 // ramp shutter speed
SetCameraParameter("shutterspeed",ShutterSpeed)
WaitForMotion(50,1.5) // waits for the image to change by 50% before continuing
NEXT I
SetCameraParameter("movie","1") // start recording a video
PanTilt(50,0,255,255) // pan slowly while recording the video
Delay(30) // pan and record for 30 seconds
PanTilt(0,0,255,255) // stop panning
SetCameraParameter("movie","0") // stop recording the video
Here is a quick video showing how to create a simple script that pans and takes a few pictures. This video actually shows the old version, the new version is much better.


150 Built in Photo Editing Effects
Touch up your photos with over 150 image processing functions built right into the  app itself. For 
example: adjust tint, color temperature, straighten images, adjust the 
color or saturation, exposure, contrast, false color, vignette, 
fish-eye, red-eye correction, including many other digital special 
effects:

The above YouTube video is not very clear, setting it to HD mode looks a tiny bit better.

HDR Photography
XtremeTether allows you to use scripts to 
achieve unlimited levels of bracketing. You can bracket almost any 
setting, not only exposure.


Which Cameras Are Supported
The
 features listed are camera dependent, not all features are available 
for all cameras (it depends on the capability of your particular 
camera).

D7000, D700, D90, CoolPix, D300, D200, D800, D3, D3s, D800e, D40, D50,

more cameras (select Nikon and Canon are currently supported). Its

story:
My name is Rayhan Al-Faridzi, and I am a 19-year-old photographer from Edmond, OK. Photography isn't just a part of my life; It's how I view the world. Photography is rooted in my mind in a way that I cannot adequately describe with words. 

 

I have been shooting for about 2 years now. My subject matter ranges from live band to wedding, but most of my portfolio is comprised of music. As far as clientele goes, I have shot the Vans Warped Tour, South By So What?! Festival, Unsilent Night Festival, A very GK! Holiday Festival.

 

on January 29th 2013, someone broke into my car while I was at a concert and stole my camera gear. I lost over $3000 worth of equipment. I am running this campaign in an attempt to help recover some of the cost so I can get new equipments. 

 

I filed a police report with all of my serial numbers. I didn't insure any of my equipment because I never thought something like this would happen to me, of course. 

 

and now I am asking for your help!

 

I lost:

- Canon 5D Mark II 

- Canon 35mm f/1.4L USM

- Canon BG-E6 Battery Grip

- 2x Canon LP-E6 battery

- 2x 16GB CF card 

 

I am not the biggest fan of asking people for money for something like this, but hopefully the added persk make it more worthwhile without devauling my photos. Choose from anything on my website. 

 

Thank you so much for taking the time to read this. Anything you can do to help is greatly appreciated!


Ray
