story:
Following the stellar success of the Pictar Smart Selfie Stick, Pictar (formerly Miggo) presents the Pictar Smart-Light Selfie Stick – The next generation of selfie sticks, hacking the perfect selfie trifecta: Light, angle & control. 

With a detachable light allowing for better selfies under any light condition, the Pictar Smart-Light selfie stick’s 6-button control panel gives you full control of all photographic elements, including zoom, image brightness and more.

Lighting is everything. Unbalanced shadows in the wrong places (i.e. under your eyes or nose) can make you look kinda meh. Even lighting will accentuate your best assets and smooth out skin damages. When you’re taking a selfie, make sure you have a good source of light in front of you (unless you’re going for a more dramatic look – in this case light coming from the side will give you a deep, contrast-y feel), or simply pop on your selfie stick’s headlight for consistent lighting that will make you look just awesome.

We believe everyone is perfect and beautiful in their own way. None of us have symmetric features or flawless skin... and that’s ok! But when we want to look good in a picture, when we need to present ourselves in a positive way – we need to find our best, most flattering angle. That much can be a tricky thing to do when taking a selfie, when your hand has to keep reaching for your phone to adjust it. That’s why we installed a tilt function into this selfie stick, so that you’ll be able to modify your phone’s angle and find your best look at the touch of a button. It’s just super easy. Try it.

The thing about selfies is that you don’t want to look like you’re trying too hard. The best way to achieve that? Just don’t try too hard! This selfie stick’s control panel, located at the base of the stick, surrounded by a rubber coat for maximum stability, gives you full control of all photographic elements, right at the tip of your fingers. Adjust zoom, light, tilt and more using the stick's control panel, so that one arm is always free to do whatever you want, and your overall pose is loose, dynamic and unassuming.

 

Awesome filters, fun effects, cool gif options, full control of all photography settings and more - the Pictar app has everyone you'll need for the perfect selfie!

The Pictar app offers a bunch of super fun filters and effects - watch the video ?

 

Your phone is craving the Smart-Light Selfie Stick! Are the two compatible? Check and see:

iPhone

6, 6S, 6 Plus, 7, 7 Plus, 8, 8 Plus,  X, XR, XS, XS Max, 11, 11 Pro, 11 Pro Max

Huawei

P8, Lite P8 (2015), Lite P8 (2017), P9, Lite P9, Lite P9 Mini, Plus P9, P10, Lite P10, Plus P10, P20, Lite P20, P20 Pro, Mate 8, Mate 9, Mate 9 Pro, Mate 10, Mate 10 Lite, Mate 20 Pro, Mate RS Porsche Design, nova 5z, Enjoy 10s, Mate 30 RS Porsche Design, Mate 30 Pro 5G, Mate 30, nova 5i Pro, Mate 20 X (5G), P30 Pro, P30, P30 lite, nova 4e, Enjoy 9s, Mate 20, Mate 20 lite, nova 3i

Pixel

Pixel, Pixel 2, Pixel 2, Pixel 3, Pixel 4

Samsung

A5, A8, A8 Plus, A9, A9 Pro, S6, S7, S8, S8 Plus, S9, S9 Plus, S10, S10e, S10 Plus, Edge S6, Edge S6 Plus, Edge S7, Edge Note, Edge Note Fan Edition, Note 7, Note 8, Note 9, Active S6, Active S7, Active S8, Xcover Pro, Note10 Lite, S10 Lite, A71, A51, A70s, M30s, A90 5G, A50s, Note10+ 5G, Note10+, Note10 5G, Note10, S10 5G, S10e, S10, S20, M40, A80, A8s, A6s, A9 (2018), A7 (2018), A70s, A71, A51

Sony Xperia

L1, M5, R1 Plus, X, XA Ultra, XA 1, XA 1 Ultra, XA 1 Plus, XA 2, XA 2 Ultra, XA 2 Plus, XZ, XZ 1, XZs, Z3+, Z5, Z5 Premium, 5, 1, 10 Plus, XZ3

Still not sure your phone can work with the Pictar Smart-Light Selfie Stick? Shoot us an email at info@pictarworld.com

Use the app with or without the stick and enjoy these pro tools to enhance any image!

After the launch of the Pictar mobile photography hub in 2019, we realized that one of the main things people are looking to do with their mobile photography is... taking selfies! We know selfies are big, that’s why we created the 1st generation of the Pictar Smart Selfie Stick, but were surprised to see it day in day out on our best sellers list. 

We then took a deep dive into Instagram, studied thousands of selfies, trying to figure out what is it that makes a good selfie and what are most people doing wrong. We realized that finding the right angle and achieving stability and control are key, but the secret sauce that’s missing from so many selfies is good lighting. 

Our product manager and lighting expert Sean immediately set out to build the team to design the perfect light this selfie stick – one that’s strong enough, adjustable enough and light to fit a selfie stick, without big or too heavy. After testing numerous options and designs, our team was able to develop and prototype the Pictar Smart-Light Selfie Stick, the ultimate stick for consistently perfect selfies!

 

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1000+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $430M raised between them.

story:
Meet ORBI Prime

Seeing is More than Believing.

ORBI Prime is the first 360° video recording eyewear that makes capturing and sharing breathtaking 360° videos and images as easy as wearing a pair of glasses. 

Designed to be powerful yet ergonomic and stylish, ORBI Prime is the next evolution of the  360° camera that offers an effortless, hands-free solution for your best moments. Embrace your next adventure with four 1080p cameras offering 4K resolution encased in a lightweight but durable polycarbonate frame, 60 minutes of recording time, built-in WiFi, water resistant design (rated up to IP64) and video stabilization. 

In case you've missed it here's a sampling of some of the news coverage we've received so far! Thanks to all our early backers who helped spread ORBI love across the world!


Effortless Recording 

Ditch the expensive mounts and rigs; keep your hands free for more important things.

Breathtaking Ultra High-Definition

Four 1080p cameras allow you to 360° create content as immersive as reality itself.

60 Minutes of Recording Time

Don’t sacrifice capturing the moments most precious to you.

Water Resistant Design

Rain, shine, or splashing freely, we’ve got you covered with IP64 rated water resistance.

Instant Mobile Sharing

With built-in Wi-Fi and industry-leading video stitching capabilities, sharing your moments with friends and family is easy.

Multilayer Real-Time Video Stabilization

Powerful video stabilization means that your videos are crisp and sharp.

Compatible with Multi-Sport Helmets

Safety should never be compromised for the perfect shot.

Polarized, Adaptive Lenses

Enjoy freedom from sun glare with UV protection.

Detachable Safety Strap

Keep ORBI Prime secure without bothering your head or tangling longer hair.

Make Your World Bigger

Capture breathtaking 360° videos and images without expensive and extra equipment. No mounts, rigs, and absolutely no hand holding. Just wear ORBI Prime like your favorite pair of glasses and record your world.

 

Express Yourself, Vividly

Everyone has different tastes, so we're offering ORBI Prime in two sizes (Male and Female) and five bold color schemes to pair perfectly for any adventure: Black/Black, Black/Fire Red, Electric Green/Charcoal, White/Slate Gray, and White/Flame Orange 

After pledging for ORBI Prime on Indiegogo, we will contact you by email to ask your sizing and color preferences.   

An essential part of any adventure. 

Whether your hiking through the mountains or traveling the world, ORBI Prime is ready to go, wherever you'll be. 

It’s all in the software. 

Our video-stitching software provides stitching up to 30 frames per second (FPS), providing a smoother, more natural viewing experience. Additional video-stabilization in post-processing reduces shakiness  and makes panning, rotation and zooming smoother. Check out our software in action and explore this kayaking trip in 360°!

App Features

The ORBI Prime app makes editing and sharing your 360° videos and images easier than ever.

Editor: The editor stitches your 360° videos together with our industry-leading software. A progress bar indicates stitching progress. Once stitched, users can cut, combine, add a soundtrack, change the reference view direction, of the video and more all on your phone. Simply watch or share a video by using the share and play buttons.

360° Player: This is a standard 360° full screen video player. Controls are hidden during playback, but can be shown by tapping the screen. Easily share your video with friends and family by using the share button present within the 360° player.

Video Gallery: View all 360° videos currently present on the device. Tap a video to edit (you will be redirected to the editor tab), watch (you will be redirected to the 360° player), share, or delete.

 

Software Specs

Desktop: Provides stitching, video editing, device memory control, and firmware update functions. Supports OSX, Windows 7, 8, 10, and higher. 

Mobile: Provides stitching (short footage up to 15 minutes), full device control, live preview, interaction with the device using built-in Wi-Fi. Supports Android 4.4+ and iOS 9+

ORBI Prime is much more than a camera.

Four 1080p cameras allow users to capture  160°X 110° FOV in portrait orientation (360° of horizontal FOV and up to 300° of upper hemisphere in stitched image)

Hardware Specs

Weight: 0.24 lbs (110 grams) 

Material: Lightweight, durable polycarbonate frame

Storage: SDXC up to 128 GB (minimum Class 10 UHS-1)

Power: 1230 mAh Li-Po battery, Micro USB for charging.

Video: Codec: H.264 Container: MP4 Audio format: AAC stereo 48KHz

Resolution: 2380x1500 (5000x2500 stitched still capture), 4x 1920x1080 30FPS (3840x1920 stitched video)

Lenses: 180x110 FOV each in portrait (360 horizontal up to 340 of upper hemisphere)

The Prime Pack (Accessory Pack) 

The Prime Pack includes all the essentials to complement your ORBI Prime. With a charging case that doubles as a travel case and USB connector you'l never be without power. We've also included a lens cloth and the detachable, adjustable safety strap to keep your glasses secure, while also managing for those with longer hair. 

 

The Rewards

After pledging for ORBI Prime on Indiegogo, we will contact you by email to ask your sizing and color preferences. 

Stretch Goals

In the event that we exceed our goal, we have more exciting plans to improve your adventuring experience by capturing it all in 360°!

Working with all of you and the rest of the amazing ORBI community we will work toward these stretch goals for the future.

$300,000 - Hardware Upgrade

If we reach $300,000 we intend to improve the some of the hardware components of ORBI Prime. This means we can invest in more durable and lighter materials in the frame construction as well as offer prescription lenses with scratch resistant, anti-fog coating.

$500,000 - Video Editing Improvements

If we reach $500,000 we intend to introduce advanced video editing capabilities such as the ability to add music, advanced cropping functionality, and subtitles.

$750,000 - Software Upgrade

If we reach $750,000 we intend to improve our software by enabling users to share their videos within the application, record from either just the two front camera or the two rear cameras to save space and create interesting wide-angle videos and images, and stitch videos in the cloud to boost video-stitching speed.

The Team

Founded by a team of veteran hardware and software engineers from leading institutions such as MIT, UC Berkeley, and Electronic Arts, as well as professional photographers and videographers, world travelers, adventurers, and outdoor enthusiasts, ORBI is uniquely positioned to radicalize the emerging 360° video industry through the harmonious blend of wearable technology.

 

 

FAQs

Q: Are you offering a warranty on ORBI Prime?

Yes, we are offering a 1 year limited warranty.

Q: How does your camera stabilize video?

ORBI Prime has electronic image stabilization as well as additional stabilization in post processing based on captured motion data.

Q: What kinds of data does ORBI Prime capture?

ORBI Prime captures live data including motion: acceleration, rotation and G-force.

Q: What resolution and Frames Per Second (FPS) does ORBI Prime support?

ORBI Prime supports 4K UHD video at 30 FPS (frames per second). 

Q: Does ORBI Prime offer live preview?

We have live preview functionality with our iOS and Android app. 

Q: Where can I stitch and edit videos from ORBI Prime?

ORBI Prime is offered with a mobile (IOS/Android) application, where videos are stitched automatically. Also it comes with desktop (Windows/MacOS) application with extended stitching and video editing functionality.

Q: Do files transfer wirelessly to my phone and auto assemble on the app?

Absolutely.

Q: Will there be the ability to do software updates to ORBI Prime camera?

You will have two ways to update you camera firmware: wirelessly via mobile application or by uploading an update to the memory card.

Q: What is the WIFI range?

Roughly 30 feet.

Q: How do you know how much power is left in the batteries?

You can see the battery status in the mobile app.

Q: How do you know how much memory is remaining?

You can see the remaining storage status in the mobile app.

Q: What is the maximum supported Micro SD card storage?

128 GB.

Q: What's the video recording duration for 128 GB of memory?

You can record up to three hours.

Q: Will a charging cable come with ORBI Prime?

Yes, each package will include a Micro USB for charging/connecting to desktop.

Q: Where will you be shipping from? Have you calculated import fees?

We will be shipping from the US or China, so you will need to determine additional fees and import taxes based on your country.

Q: What is your Frame of View (FOV)?

For each lens, FOV is 170°. the entire FOV is 360°x 300° covering the upper hemisphere.

Q: What is ORBI Prime's sound quality?

ORBI Prime records stereo AAC audio at 48KHz, 128Kbit/s.

Q: Are you shipping internationally?

Yes, we are shipping internationally. Please keep in mind taxes and additional fees may apply.

Q: Can you ensure a shipping date?

We are confident with our product timeline, however we will let all backers know if any unexpected changes come up.

Risks & Challenges

As with building any sophisticated consumer product, we will depend on others in terms of manufacturing, shipping, logistics, etc. We are fully confident that our partnerships with these established companies will deliver on our timeline and expectations. We are in communication with each partner along the supply chain to ensure that all the parts come together the best way they can. Additionally, we will make field visits to our factory in China to absolutely ensure production is to the quality we expect. However, bumps are expected along the way; be it customs, shipping, or manufacturing issues, that can all delay the process. We will keep you updated every step along the way.

Thanks from all of us!

Team ORBI

Legal Disclaimer

Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed. We will absolutely try our best ensure timely delivery and the highest product quality and customer satisfaction.

story:
Simply put, my DSLR is starting to show its age, and attending my graduate year at the college next year, there isn't much money left for new equipment.

As most of you know, I live and breath and love photography.  School has made me slow down on the uploads, but before Convergence Journalism and Photojournalism took up most of my time, I was posting a lot to my Red Bubble page, www.redbubble.com/people/richards, where you'll be able to see some of the things I was able to achieve with my old camera up until now.

From you, my friends, family, and perfect strangers, all I ask is a donation of $10 or $20 or more if you really like to help me break down the cost of buying my new camera body. For donations of $50-$99, I'm happy to offer an hour photoshoot for anyone in the Windsor-Essex County area, and a 2 hour shoot for anything in the $100+ range if anyone is so daring and kind!  For fellow photographers, I would love to offer the same time in photo walks/adventures if you would prefer instead.

For those who are curious, I'm looking to buy a Canon 6D package with a 40mm lens.  This camera is pretty much my dream camera, and will allow me to do so much more and expand upon what I already know with the art.

My birthday is August 12th, so there's just over a month to this campaign.  I don't know if this will work, but I have faith in all of you and this community!  Even if the whole cost isn't raised, I will be that much closer to owning my new dream camera, and rest assured all the money will be set aside strictly for that.

Cheers!

story:
If I haven't got camera - I can't work and study. And I'm not Flóra Borsi anymore. 

 

UPDATE: http://youtu.be/AvMSloorOww

 

About me

My name is Flóra Borsi. I'm 20 years old and I live in Hungary.

I've interested in photo-manipulating since 2004. I've been taking photos since 2007. I won a half-professional camera on a photo contest in 2008 and I've been working with that since then.I usually do (self) portraits, concept arts, photo-manipulations, fashion editorials.
The essence of my photos is to visualize the physically impossible in a form of photo manipulation.

Published on :

The Daily Mail
The Huffington Post
The Guardian - The Observer
Yahoo
Adobe Photoshop
La Repubblica

I need your help

My current camera (Canon eos 40D - 2008) is almost dying. I've made 60.000 photographs, and I can't buy new. Hopefully I will be admitted to University - Photography Department , that's the second reason why I'm asking for help. 

 

 Here is the video http://youtu.be/XmvGyTO2vGE


 

 

 

Thank you!

www.facebook.com/floraborsiphotography

story:
With our app, you have full control over - Hue, Saturation, brightness, and kelvin. Sync and control up to 10 units at a time! 

Full Spectrum is rated IP68 which can be 1.5m underwater for up to thirty minutes.

 

 

 The Lumin8 Plate is versatile; mount and adjust up to 4 units at a time with the plate.

We are clumsy on set. We made Lumin8 shockproof so if you drop it on accident it is no sweat!

The battery can last up to 12 hours - 5 hours on maximum output. It will completely recharge in 4 hours with the Type C quick charge input.

 Lumin8 Full Spectrum will be the third product we have introduced to the market! We are so excited to get the full spectrum into your hands so your creativity can flourish without limits. Everywhere we bring full spectrum to shoot we have strangers running up to us asking what it is, where did we get it, and commenting how bright it is (and how it looks like a lightsaber).

We have a fulltime support staff you can reach at Hello@shoplumin8.com

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.

story:
The single solution with everything a motorcyclist needs to ride in comfort and worry free:

  •  Record everything that happens in front and behind you with 2x 143-degree 1080p Full HD video cameras
     
  •  Check your blind spots through the intuitive HUD
     
  •  Stay in touch with other riders with group calls
     
  •  Save and share the GPS coordinates of your tour map
     
  •  Get directions as you ride through the distraction-free HUD
     
  •  Film a video of your epic ride and upload to social media
     
  •  Listen to your favorite music or podcasts
     

All without taking your eyes off the road or hands off the handlebars.

Revan was designed following all standards of communication, helmet design and road safety in Europe, USA and Japan.

 

 

As bikers, we need to be aware of everything, in every direction. But flying down the roads, most of us have no idea of the dangers around us. There may be a car rushing through your blindspot or animals crossing ahead of you.
And before you lift your sight or look over your shoulder, you’ve already lost some crucial reaction time, which can lead to accidents.
You never know if or when something unexpected may happen, so take control of your safety at all times.

With Revan, you're back in control. Its 1080p Full HD camera records everything behind, in front and to the sides of you and shows you a live-feed of your camera through its integrated heads-up-display.

Use the HUD to also monitor your speed, location, time, battery levels and other useful metrics in real-time.

 

 

The ultrawide 143° field-of-view each of its front and rear cameras minimizes distortion and allows for the highest video resolution possible while capturing everything around you and your motorbike. 

 

 

 

Having to tilt your head to look around at your surroundings is both inconvenient and potentially dangerous.

That’s why Revan’s integrated HUD is strategically positioned in the lower right corner of the helmet, so you can see it at all times without having to tilt your head. Never strain your eyes or lose sight of the world in front of you, thanks to the infinity focus technology of the HUD. You can further refine the HUD’s position with micro-adjustments.

HUD covers are available in two types—See-through and See-closed—to match your riding style.

 

 

 

Follow directions through your HUD using Google Maps or our native navigation app. 

 

 

Stopping to look at maps, or glancing down at your GPS will at best detract from your riding experience, and at worst is just unsafe. With Revan, you never need to take your eyes off the road. Directions are always visible through the HUD.

 

 

Revan works on your helmet. There’s no need to buy or use a special helmet. We know how carefully you’ve chosen your helmet and we don’t want you to give up on it. Revan is compatible with most full- and open-face helmets including your go-to HJC, SHOEI, and Arai.

Mount it on your favourite helmet in under 20 seconds and set off on an exhilarating ride.
 

 

With the additional brackets, you can switch the dashcam between your favourite helmets. Revan’s integrated HUD too can be easily migrated using the enclosed small wrench. 10 seconds is usually enough to disconnect it. 

 

Operate the HUD easily using the wireless Bluetooth remote control.

Attach it to either side of your handlebars in a position that’s comfortable for you to reach. Individual buttons on the remote control provide tactile feedback and make it easier to monitor your blindspots, adjust the volume or make a phone call.

 

 

In an emergency, every second counts.

With Revan's hands-free gesture control, you heighten your spidey sense. It detects the slightest preconfigured gesture—even a slight head tilt—and activates the rear-view camera in a split second to show you if there are any safety threats you should pay attention to.

Quickly configure Revan’s sensitivity to your movements right from within its smartphone app.

 

 

As a member of the Hyundai and Kia Motors Incubator Programs in South Korea, the Revan team has access to supreme manufacturing techniques and resources to bring ultimate 2-wheel safety to all riders from all around the world.

Kia and Hyundai also hold us to very high standards, ensuring we deliver an excellent product no matter what.

 

 

A fun trip can have us riding for hours, and you don’t just need to be safe for the first half. With Revan, you can ride in safety, knowing that you won’t run out of power—even on the longest journeys.
 

Smart helmets become dead weight if they don’t have power. Revan’s two lightweight batteries with 7,000 mAh of power will last you 12 hours of safe riding on a single charge. 

 

 With USB-C charging and its portable cigarette lighter socket, you can rapidly recharge your Revan’s batteries on-the-fly whenever you take a quick break.

 

 

No matter how fast you fly, Revan remains securely attached to your helmet. Even at exhilarating speeds of 124 mph (200 km/h), its aerodynamic form will not cause you even mild discomfort or fatigue.

 

 

Revan comes with its intuitive smartphone application. Use it to watch the live feed of your front and rear cameras, set up group calls, or adjust the settings in your HUD.

 

 

 

Riding in a group can be a breathtaking experience. But keeping in touch on the mountain curves can be a real nightmare. Revan enhances your collective riding experience, offering leader-centric group calling to keep in touch with everyone in the group.

Whether it’s 5 or 50 of you, with Revan’s VoIP-based group calling, you can invite all your rider friends to a group call. The special permissions let the lead rider take control of the call by allowing other riders to talk and reduce the level of the chatter in the background. 

 

 

 

Your GPS data is automatically collected as your footage is recorded.

You can review the GPS track of your ride and create a tour map to share it with the rest of the riders in your group or save it for the next time you decide to ride that journey. 

 

 

Record everything with Revan, so you can share it with all your rider friends on social media.

Its directional microphone records crisp crystal clear noise-free audio alongside the Full HD video.

Stream your ride live, save it for later, or easily upload it to social media via the Revan App or your preferred application.

 

Easily listen to your favorite music or podcast with crystal clear audio thanks to Revan's in-helmet speakers and Revan's smartphone app.

Change tracks easily with the touch of a button from the remote. 

 

 

Stay safe and visible from behind as you ride, thanks to Revan's integrated lights.

 Mounted on the battery module, the powerful LED lights allow other drivers to see you any time of night or day.

 

 

We are a group of motorcycling enthusiasts. We’ve been riding motorcycles since we were teenagers, spending our every weekend exploring the highways of South Korea, our homecountry.

Once part of the Samsung Electronics team, our team members have vast experience in developing a series of electronic and home IoT devices. One of our team members also served in the South Korean Marine Corps for 8 years.

Our team knows what goes into making a product that ensures motorcycle riders are safe on the road.

We have the knowledge, expertise and unwavering determination to keep everybody safe on the roads without silencing the adventure-driven within ourselves.
story_txt:
The single solution with everything a motorcyclist needs to ride in comfort and worry free:
 Record everything that happens in front and behind you with 2x 143-degree 1080p Full HD video cameras 
 Check your blind spots through the intuitive HUD 
 Stay in touch with other riders with group calls 
 Save and share the GPS coordinates of your tour map 
 Get directions as you ride through the distraction-free HUD 
 Film a video of your epic ride and upload to social media 
 Listen to your favorite music or podcasts 
All without taking your eyes off the road or hands off the handlebars.Revan was designed following all standards of communication, helmet design and road safety in Europe, USA and Japan. 
 
  As bikers, we need to be aware of everything, in every direction. But flying down the roads, most of us have no idea of the dangers around us. There may be a car rushing through your blindspot or animals crossing ahead of you.And before you lift your sight or look over your shoulder, you’ve already lost some crucial reaction time, which can lead to accidents.You never know if or when something unexpected may happen, so take control of your safety at all times.With Revan, you're back in control. Its 1080p Full HD camera records everything behind, in front and to the sides of you and shows you a live-feed of your camera through its integrated heads-up-display.Use the HUD to also monitor your speed, location, time, battery levels and other useful metrics in real-time.  
 
 The ultrawide 143° field-of-view each of its front and rear cameras minimizes distortion and allows for the highest video resolution possible while capturing everything around you and your motorbike.   
 
 
 
 
 
  Having to tilt your head to look around at your surroundings is both inconvenient and potentially dangerous.That’s why Revan’s integrated HUD is strategically positioned in the lower right corner of the helmet, so you can see it at all times without having to tilt your head. Never strain your eyes or lose sight of the world in front of you, thanks to the infinity focus technology of the HUD. You can further refine the HUD’s position with micro-adjustments.HUD covers are available in two types—See-through and See-closed—to match your riding style.  

 
Follow directions through your HUD using Google Maps or our native navigation app.   Stopping to look at maps, or glancing down at your GPS will at best detract from your riding experience, and at worst is just unsafe. With Revan, you never need to take your eyes off the road. Directions are always visible through the HUD.  
  Revan works on your helmet. There’s no need to buy or use a special helmet. We know how carefully you’ve chosen your helmet and we don’t want you to give up on it. Revan is compatible with most full- and open-face helmets including your go-to HJC, SHOEI, and Arai.Mount it on your favourite helmet in under 20 seconds and set off on an exhilarating ride.  
 
 

 With the additional brackets, you can switch the dashcam between your favourite helmets. Revan’s integrated HUD too can be easily migrated using the enclosed small wrench. 10 seconds is usually enough to disconnect it.  
 Operate the HUD easily using the wireless Bluetooth remote control.Attach it to either side of your handlebars in a position that’s comfortable for you to reach. Individual buttons on the remote control provide tactile feedback and make it easier to monitor your blindspots, adjust the volume or make a phone call.  
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 In an emergency, every second counts.With Revan's hands-free gesture control, you heighten your spidey sense. It detects the slightest preconfigured gesture—even a slight head tilt—and activates the rear-view camera in a split second to show you if there are any safety threats you should pay attention to.Quickly configure Revan’s sensitivity to your movements right from within its smartphone app.  
 
 
 As a member of the Hyundai and Kia Motors Incubator Programs in South Korea, the Revan team has access to supreme manufacturing techniques and resources to bring ultimate 2-wheel safety to all riders from all around the world.Kia and Hyundai also hold us to very high standards, ensuring we deliver an excellent product no matter what.  
 A fun trip can have us riding for hours, and you don’t just need to be safe for the first half. With Revan, you can ride in safety, knowing that you won’t run out of power—even on the longest journeys. 
 
 Smart helmets become dead weight if they don’t have power. Revan’s two lightweight batteries with 7,000 mAh of power will last you 12 hours of safe riding on a single charge.  
 
 
 
 
 
  With USB-C charging and its portable cigarette lighter socket, you can rapidly recharge your Revan’s batteries on-the-fly whenever you take a quick break. 
 No matter how fast you fly, Revan remains securely attached to your helmet. Even at exhilarating speeds of 124 mph (200 km/h), its aerodynamic form will not cause you even mild discomfort or fatigue.

Revan enhances your collective riding experience, offering leader-centric group calling to keep in touch with everyone in the group.Whether it’s 5 or 50 of you, with Revan’s VoIP-based group calling, you can invite all your rider friends to a group call. The special permissions let the lead rider take control of the call by allowing other riders to talk and reduce the level of the chatter in the background.   
  Your GPS data is automatically collected as your footage is recorded.You can review the GPS track of your ride and create a tour map to share it with the rest of the riders in your group or save it for the next time you decide to ride that journey.  
  Record everything with Revan, so you can share it with all your rider friends on social media.Its directional microphone records crisp crystal clear noise-free audio alongside the Full HD video.Stream your ride live, save it for later, or easily upload it to social media via the Revan App or your preferred application. 
 Easily listen to your favorite music or podcast with crystal clear audio thanks to Revan's in-helmet speakers and Revan's smartphone app.Change tracks easily with the touch of a button from the remote.  
 
 
  Stay safe and visible from behind as you ride, thanks to Revan's integrated lights. Mounted on the battery module, the powerful LED lights allow other drivers to see you any time of night or day.

We’ve been riding motorcycles since we were teenagers, spending our every weekend exploring the highways of South Korea, our homecountry.Once part of the Samsung Electronics team, our team members have vast experience in developing a series of electronic and home IoT devices. One of our team members also served in the South Korean Marine Corps for 8 years.Our team knows what goes into making a product that ensures motorcycle riders are safe on the road.We have the knowledge, expertise and unwavering determination to keep everybody safe on the roads without silencing the adventure-driven within ourselves.

story:
Why We Start the Project?

Traditional panoramic photography is very professional and the equipment is expensive. That's not for everyone. Recently there are some inexpensive lenses for iPhone coming out that could capture either 360° photos or interactive videos. But none of them could make them both. Why should we bother with two stand-alone lenses? Can’t we just hit two birds with one “Lens”? And meanwhile keep it simple, inexpensive and accessible to everyone? That is the idea behind this project. 

Then we found that if we re-design the fisheye lens and fit it to mobile phone, people could easily use it for making both 360° photos and interactive videos.

So here it is:

                       

We designed this brand new fisheye lens for iPhone/iPad, which could capture over 180° field of view in all directions (photo mode & video mode). The app for unwrapping videos and stitch photos into 360° panorama is also needed. 

So the project consists of 3 parts:

  • HotPano mini – the re-designed super fisheye lens for iPhone/iPad.
  • Hot Pano – the app to process the videos and photos shot with HotPano mini.
  • iPanoCloud.com – a one-stop platform for users to upload and share their works. People could also explore and find the most creative videos and photos on it.

About "HotPano mini"

HotPano mini is a super fisheye lens that could capture over 180° field of view in all directions.

What’s the difference between "HotPano mini" and "normal ones"?

       

In the past 3 months, we’ve designed and tested 3 prototypes and now we are almost there.  

 

About "Hot Pano" App

 

The app to process the videos and photos shot with HotPano mini. As we can see the photo and video shot with fisheye lens are curved. By using this app, we could correct the distortion and give users the 360° immersive view. 

Features:

1.       Unwarp the video (shot with HotPano mini).

2.       Stitch fisheye images (captured with HotPano mini) into full 360° panorama.

3.       View 360° videos and photos in an immersive way (pan, tilt, zoom in/out).

4.       Upload data to www.iPanoCloud.com for storage and sharing.

5.       Explore 360° videos & photos shared by other users.

6.       One-click Facebook & Twitter sharing.

7.       Any other features you want? Please leave us a message or send us an email.

About "www.iPanoCloud.com"

It’s a one-stop service platform for all users’ work, including online processing, hosting, sharing and exploring.

Features:

1.       Hosting of users’ 360° videos and photos.

2.       Online-stitching of fisheye images into panorama.

3.       One-click Facebook & Twitter sharing, and other social networks.

4.       Explore 360° videos & photos shared by users all over the world.           
          View them in an interactive way (pan, tilt, zoom in/out).

5.       Anything else you want, please leave us a message. Thank you!

Examples:

1. 360° Photo (Panorama):

 

It could also be viewed in an immersive way.

http://www.ipanocloud.com/28/panodetail/. 

2. Interactive video demo:

http://www.ipanocloud.com/48/panodetail/

We Need Your Help

We’ve finished the design and had the working prototype and essential software ready. A web platform to host 360° photos and interactive videos is on its way. We’re thrilled with this project and looking forward to starting the production ASAP. Support us on Indiegogo, tell your friends and spread the idea. Your support will make this product a reality and change the world in a 360° way. :)

- Hot Pano Team

*HotPano mini is not only compatible with iPhone/iPad, but also with most of the  smart phone. Today we only have the app for iOS. But with the success of this project, we will soon expand to Android, Windows Phone platform and even develop the Web App in future. 

 

*Apple is a trademark of Apple Inc., no endorsement implied.

story:
**PROMOTION!!**

--------

(1/2)The first 15 people to fund this campaign through paypal only at $50 or above will receive an original Lynny for their choice of Nikon or Canon, along with a personal, handwritten and signed thank you note in the package.* If you live in US, it's free shipping. If you live outside US, the shipping is $30, so there is a minimum of $80 required if you live outside of the US and you want to participate in this event.

--------

(2/2) The first 15 people to fund this campaign through paypal only at $200 or above will receive their choice of a Nikon or Canon Film SLR with an original Lynny to go with their Nikon or Canon SLR Camera, along with a personal, handwritten and signed thank you note in the package.* If you live in US, it's free shipping. If you live outside US, the shipping is $30, so there is a minimum of $230 required if you live outside of the US and you want to participate in this event.

--------

*Requirement: You can not choose a perk to qualify for this promotion. This is a perk by itself



My Story

I have invented something truly unique, something that will unleash the inner artist in you, by means of digital or film photography, by the use of SLR cameras. This invention is called the Lynny, an artistic, selective focus lens for the two major camera brands, Nikon and Canon. The Lynny will be your tool to get creative, artistic, and truly amazing photos, without all the time and effort of using photo editing software, no matter how easy or hard it is. It's easier to me, to get the desired effect the first time, with one press of a button - that button being the shutter button on an SLR camera. That's why I created the Lynny, so you don't have to do the post processing. The Lynny is YOUR tool to unleash your photographic creativity, your inner artist.

The original Lynny is made so you can focus on things from at least 5 feet (hypothesis), to as far as infinity. I also have available, a Lynny made for closer up shots (around a foot away) and also one for in between those two distances.

These Lynnys are only made for Nikon and Canon at the moment. I'd love to make these for other camera brands, and I plan to in the future, but I will have to make them and test them out on other camera brands, so as time goes by, I will consider other camera brands when I find out how well the Lynny works with them





The Effect

What will this project do for you and others? If this project is successful, the Lynny will be released and made available to the world, and give people something fun to do with their cameras and with other people. The Lynny is all about having fun and experimenting and just enjoying photography, period. If the campaign doesn't succeed, then it will not be possible to share my creation with the world and for everyone to enjoy the Lynny and it's effects. That would be a total bummer


What I Need For This to Be A Success

The parts I will need to do this are a good amount of money, and I will need to start off with about 500 of each to go somewhere with this. The parts I will need for the Nikon version of the Lynny will total to $7,250 for 500 of each parts

The parts for the Canon version of the Lynny will total to $7,900

And the Miscellaneous parts I'll need will cost over $1,500

I will also need about $10,000 to cover the costs of the parts I will need to make a Lynny Pro which I have already planned out.

Getting above the amount needed for this campaign will be a TREMENDOUS help, and it will allow me to purchase advertising spots on websites to put banners to advertise the product, as well as having the necessary amount of money to pay the fees to keep the domain name for the website active and running, and also to cover the costs of the web hosting service and any software I will need to build the websites and maintain it. It will too, allow me to have some extra room to expand this project, and do more upgrades to the Lynny to make it even better than it already is and will be. Also it would help me to have the money to open up the shop in my town to be able to offer these to people around here locally, and to purchase all the things I need to run the business, like a computer and software to complete transactions, as well as decorations, furniture, and any other things needed for the local shop. The money may also be used for hiring mobile app developers, as well as Mac and Windows developers, to build an application to promote this product in creative ways. I will also have a Google Chrome application made for the product. And the money will surly be used for Facebook advertising, as well as Google advertising, to promote and advertise the product. Not to mention it will allow me to create more of these lenses so more people can have them.

So with that said, if everyone seeing this campaign donated any amount, I believe the campaign would exceed the amount I am asking by far. So why not fund this project; It would be a Major help to me, and to you, as well as everyone around the world. Make a difference, help me help you, and help the world.


Other Ways You Can Help

You're wondering how you can help? What you could do first, is to please spread the word and this project as much as you can, and as often as you can, which will help me out extremely! Tweet about it, make facebook wall posts, make an article in your blog, do anything you can, because with your help, this project will be a success story! And don't forget - There are share tools you can use!


Please help make my Lynny everyone's tool to unleash their photographic creativity!











------------------------------------------------------------


Here is a comparison photo between the Lynny and the original Lensbaby. (See below for more info.)

You can see that there is a difference. I personally like the Lynny better, because of these reasons:


1.) The blur doesn't cover most of the photo. If you were to move the lens on the Lensbaby around, all the way to the left, or right, the blur would still be on whichever side you point it to, as well as the other side. But with the Lynny, if you point the lens to the left or right, most of that side you point it to will be in focus, if not the whole side, depending on how far you point it to the side, and the other side will have the blur. It gives you more control with the Lynny, and doesn't blur most of the photo.

2.) The blur on the Lynny is more of a "creative" blur, it has an artistic look to it, not just a very soft blur like the Lensbaby has, at least to the Lensbaby I tried. The Lynny has more of a "zooming" look to the blur.

3.) The Lynny is different...Period. It just is. It's one of a kind. It's a really cool and fun lens to use for photography, which is the reason I love it most.

If this campaign is successful, and you receive a Lynny if you fund it, you will definitely see what I'm talking about!

story:
I love a new year - a reminder of past and future growth opportunities, a fresh calendar to fill, and renewed commitment to excellence, change, and accomplishment. 

But yesterday, January 2nd, which began with a sunny bike ride around San Francisco, ended up in tears and frustration, an unfortunate start to the year. While returning to my friend Christine's apartment on the Sausalito ferry, my Canon 5d Mark II camera was stolen. I informed ferry operators, filed a police report, checked lost and found, with no result. The event has left me feeling hopeless and sick. Mad at myself, mad at whoever stole it, mad at whatever coincidence of circumstances led to this theft. 

     

Many of you know, I am not one to give in to discouragement. When I want to make something happen, I determinedly do, with discipline and faith. I moved to New York a year and a half ago after graduating with a BFA from BYU to fulfill my dream in commercial still life photography. I've been blessed and fortunate to work as a freelancer in the greatest city in the world, quickly gaining opportunities as a prop stylist and photographer, and the chance to travel for work assignments. I'm grateful as I hope to continue meeting career expectations and expanding my portfolio in 2015, but this setback has discouraged and stalled my plans. 

            

My camera is (was) both a means of providing income and my most valuable tool. So its loss is doubly painful right now. I know this problem is less significant than what many others confront, but New York is no cheap place to survive; having lost several thousand dollars of equipment in an instant is devastating, and its replacement a challenge. 

I hesitate to ask for help, because I value being independent and self sufficient, living on my own in NYC. I'm embarrassed to offer my problems to others. However, this loss is beyond me. After crying way too many tears, I am humbled. True, the worst events can bring the most growth, and this week has humbled me and reawakened gratitude for past support I've received. I could really use your help. 

     

Thanks for the encouragement I encounter daily from all of you. I am beyond lucky to be doing what I love and creating beautiful photographs for a living. 

Any amount would be helpful, even a dollar. As you donate to a level of $5, $25, $100, $500, or $1000, you will receive the perks listed at right. If I should happen to surpass this goal I will invest in other photo equipment (lighting, lens, scrims, other grip/gear) I need but have been unable to purchase. 

     


Thank you in advance for any support and generosity! I appreciate you all.
See more of my work at http://www.veronicaolson.com and http://instagram.com/
Update: Some good news! After talking to my insurance company I thought my policy didn't cover it, but my agent just called and turns out I can hopefully get around $1000. So  I'm that much closer -  thanks for your continued help!
story_txt:
I love a new year - a reminder of past and future growth opportunities, a fresh calendar to fill, and renewed commitment to excellence, change, and accomplishment. But yesterday, January 2nd, which began with a sunny bike ride around San Francisco, ended up in tears and frustration, an unfortunate start to the year. While returning to my friend Christine's apartment on the Sausalito ferry, my Canon 5d Mark II camera was stolen. I informed ferry operators, filed a police report, checked lost and found, with no result. The event has left me feeling hopeless and sick. Mad at myself, mad at whoever stole it, mad at whatever coincidence of circumstances led to this theft. 

     Many of you know, I am not one to give in to discouragement. When I want to make something happen, I determinedly do, with discipline and faith. I moved to New York a year and a half ago after graduating with a BFA from BYU to fulfill my dream in commercial still life photography. I've been blessed and fortunate to work as a freelancer in the greatest city in the world, quickly gaining opportunities as a prop stylist and photographer, and the chance to travel for work assignments. I'm grateful as I hope to continue meeting career expectations and expanding my portfolio in 2015, but this setback has discouraged and stalled my plans. 
            My camera is (was) both a means of providing income and my most valuable tool. So its loss is doubly painful right now. I know this problem is less significant than what many others confront, but New York is no cheap place to survive; having lost several thousand dollars of equipment in an instant is devastating, and its replacement a challenge. 
I hesitate to ask for help, because I value being independent and self sufficient, living on my own in NYC. I'm embarrassed to offer my problems to others. However, this loss is beyond me. After crying way too many tears, I am humbled. True, the worst events can bring the most growth, and this week has humbled me and reawakened gratitude for past support I've received. I could really use your help. 
     
Thanks for the encouragement I encounter daily from all of you. I am beyond lucky to be doing what I love and creating beautiful photographs for a living. 
Any amount would be helpful, even a dollar. As you donate to a level of $5, $25, $100, $500, or $1000, you will receive the perks listed at right. If I should happen to surpass this goal I will invest in other photo equipment (lighting, lens, scrims, other grip/gear) I need but have been unable to purchase. 
     Thank you in advance for any support and generosity! I appreciate you all.

See more of my work at http://www.veronicaolson.com and http://instagram.com/

story:
Introducing Bevel

The first accessory of its kind, Bevel turns your ordinary smartphone or tablet into an amazing 3D camera. 

What Makes Bevel So Special?

Bevel is the world’s first attachment capable of capturing real 3D photographs on any smartphone or tablet. Other 3D attachments create the illusion of 3D by enhancing the depth of an image, but fail to capture a file that you can actually use. You can even use Bevel for 3D printing. That's why we call it Genuine 3D™ photography.

 

How do I use Bevel? 

You already know how to use Bevel. Simply plug the Bevel into the headphone jack of your smartphone or tablet, and then pan the person, place or thing, just like a regular photograph.

Bevel plugs right into your headphone jack

How does Bevel work?
Bevel uses an eye safe laser light and the existing camera on your Android or iOS device, to capture photographs in a whole new dimension. Simply plug it in, and pan the person, place or thing you want to capture. Bevel creates beautiful 3D photographs that you can use in amazing ways.

                       3D photo taken with Bevel and hosted on Cashew3d.com

3D photo taken with an early Bevel prototype


What does a Genuine 3D™ photograph look like? 

We're still in development, but below are a couple of examples of Bevel Genuine 3D™ photographs of team members Laura and Travis that were taken with early prototypes. These are super early, and we expect the final photos to look like this or better. 

Click here to see Laura in Genuine 3D™

Click here to see Travis in Genuine 3D™

Genuine 3D™ photographs are like freezing a moment in time. The photos can be rotated, turned into animated GIFs and viewed from multiple angles. You can also add an image of the background behind the 3D photo. They can be shared through Cashew and the Bevel app directly to sites like Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr, Wordpress blogs, Instagram, Pinterest, etc. 


What can you do with Bevel's Genuine 3D™ photos?

With the Bevel app you can do everything you do with ordinary photos. Post your 3D pictures on Facebook, Instagram, Tumblr, Twitter or any social network. Use the Bevel app to share directly to friends or upload and share them online with a link. Save them and even use them for animation, video game design and 3D printing.

Or, simply share directly to your contact list.


Why?

Because we say so much with pictures. We use photographs to make people laugh, to tell stories, to express our emotions, and to preserve our most cherished memories.

When it comes to communicating visually, photos are great and video is even better. But the problem is we don’t live in a flat, two-dimensional world. It’s not our native dimension. When we communicate with ordinary photographs, we’re never really telling the whole story because the fact is, a photograph just isn’t the whole picture. But together, we can change that.

3D photography is possible, and we want to make it happen right now. 

Features:

Bevel size comparison.

Pre-orders also include a Bevel keychain attachment so your Bevel is always at your side.

About Us:


We're the same folks behind the Matter and Form 3D Scanner and Cashew3D.com.

We make the products we do because we believe that 3D hardware, software and content shouldn’t be expensive, complicated or unmanageable. We think that 3D content should be as easy to use as your smartphone or your favorite social network and we’re dedicated to creating products that make 3D truly accessible, affordable and easy to use.

Our company was started by friends. We needed a 3D scanner but we couldn’t afford to buy one, so we invented our own. Two years ago we decided to share our design with the world and asked the crowd funding community to help us make 3D scanning truly affordable and easy to us. The response we got was just incredible. Today, the Matter and Form 3D Scanner has sold thousands of units and ships all over the world.

Now, we want to put the power of 3D into people’s hands and totally change the way you communicate with Bevel.

Risks and challenges

As with any product development, unforeseen challenges are inevitable. The good news is, this is our second crowdfunding campaign and the third product we're bringing to market, so we have a pretty good idea of what lies ahead and we're well equipped to deal with whatever comes our way.

That being said, common obstacles that come up for product designers like us include:
  • Shortages in hardware components 
  • Delays in customs 
  • Shipments that are lost or damaged 
  • Language and translation in the App and Manual (Bevel will be English only to start) 
  • Your phone: (We've designed Bevel to be a one-size-fits-all attachment and we're aiming to make Bevel work on any modern iOS or Android smartphone or tablet. We will discover which, if any, phones or tablets will not work with the Bevel once the project is underway and let you know asap if there are any issues)

As always, we are dedicated to making sure you know what is happening every step of the way. We'll be updating you folks regularly and letting you know exactly what's going on as Bevel development progresses.

After all, we're doing this together.

FAQ
Will it fit my phone in a case?

Most likely. We've designed Bevel to fit most smart phones or tablets with most slim cases. However, there are so many cases and phones in the world it's impossible to be sure. If for some reason the Bevel does not fit your phone, you can contact us for a refund.

Can I use this like a 3D Scanner?

Yes, but, Bevel isn't designed to be a 3D Scanner, but a 3D photography attachment. First and foremost it's about capturing moments and sharing them in 3D. In order to use Bevel as a scanner, you may need to use Cashew to help process and download your model, and possibly a 3rd party software to clean and make manifold for printing.

What distance does Bevel work at?

Depending on your phone, the optimum distance with the laser is about 1 meter. In a future release, we are planning on using the Bevel to capture entire buildings, and even cities.

Can I 3D print my photo?

Yes. But keep in mind Bevel is designed for creating Genuine 3D™ photographs. At the moment, the photos you take with the Bevel can be downloaded directly from Cashew as OBJ, STL, PLY and DAE. Cashew will also soon have a feature that will help make your models water tight.
Can I use Bevel outside?
Bevel uses visible light to capture 3D data, and so bright light like direct sunlight is a problem. We're working on ways to get you a result even in the least ideal conditions, but the best results are indoors with standard lighting.

Is there a minimum megapixel needed for my camera on my phone?

No, there is no minimum quality required as of yet. But please note, we've seen better 3D photos with an iPhone 6 camera over an earlier iPad.

What type of phone do I need to have?

Bevel will work with most modern smartphones and tablets. While it's impossible to know for certain ahead of time the details of each and every possible combination for Bevel and smartphones or tablets, we have designed the device for a universal fit and we have a fairly good idea about requirements.

Here are some basics to help you decide:

For both Android and iOS we recommend that your device has an accelerometer and a gyroscope. Or at minimum a 6-Axis accelerometer. Phones with no gyroscope may get different results. Also we recommend having Kit-Kat or higher.

For iOS devices, we recommend any devices that can run iOS 8 and higher.

Other phones and tablets are likely to work and we will do our best to consider them, however, as a starting point, the list above is our development threshold.

What is the battery life / charging time?

Bevel works a lot like the flash on your phone. If the laser was to be used constantly, it would provide roughly 3 hours of battery life before needing to be charged. Depending on how many photos you take, this should get you through the day, roughly matching your phones battery life. 

Charging time on a standard adapter should be anywhere from 20 - 30 min. 
The Bevel does not use power from your phone, and will be charged with a separate cable.

What file formats are supported?

At the moment, the photos you take with the Bevel can be downloaded directly from Cashew as OBJ, STL, PLY and DAE. 
Bevel's native file format, as well as export options, have not been decided on yet. We are open to suggestions if you have a preference.

Can you scan from 360 degrees?

We haven't gotten to that point in our development, but yes, that has always been our vision. Keep in mind though, that for 360 degree scans, you subject will have to remain still. Because of processing times, longer, or more elaborate Bevel photos, may end up being an advanced feature.

Do you support Blackberry or Windows Phone?

Our goal is to under-promise, over-deliver. We'll make Bevel available to as many people as we can, but right now we can only promise iOS and Android.

story: As mentioned earlier I'm a 30+ year Wedding / Event photographer. As a father of seven I know how  todays teens need as much direction  and mentoring as possible. It gives me great joy and a since of purpose to help others, especially young people. I'm happy to have been working closely with two young men who aspire to be photographers for several months now. My goal is to help even more teens. To fulfill this goal I need your help. Your dollars will help buy more camera equipment and others accessories. These items will be used by teens in my mentoring program. Thanks in advance for your support.

story:
Short Summary

For those of you who don't know me, my name is David Evanko, I am a photographer, and for the last year I have been searching low and high for up and coming musicians throughout Southern California. My goal is to capture the budding rock and roll culture that is forming out of the grungy underground from San Diego to LA.

Within the last few months I have really made progress with venues and artists and have received amazing support from everyone. However, on Christmas Day I was in San Diego on my way to visit my family and decided to have a quick surf in La Jolla. When I got out of the water I found my truck ransacked with literally everything of value gone, including every piece of photo equipment I owned. Phones, wallets, iPods, clothing and other nonsense is easy to live without, but every ounce of extra cash I have come across in the last year has been dedicated to my photography and this is devastating to the little amount of business I have created. I know we're fresh out of the holidays and I know money is tight for everybody, so all I ask is for the bare minimum of what you wish to give.

I will use whatever is raised through this to purchase a new camera and get the ball rolling again. Not only will you be supporting me, but you will be supporting the local musicians in Southern California that I work endlessly to expose. I don't expect much and if you know me you know that I am not one to ask for favors, but I have endless gratitude for anyone willing to help. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone has cash to spare and I am right there with you. All I ask is that you spread the word to keep the little man alive.

If you hear of any other robberies in the Scripps/Black's Beach areas please report them to the San Diego County Sheriff's Department as soon as possible. I am working closely with them now to try to catch these idiots.

story:
FOCUSED

Project Synopsis 


• 


The Mission 


One camera. One click. One moment.


In an age where digital photography, the Internet, and motor drives have accelerated the process of image-making, the thought, vision and construction of the decisive moment gets lost in the rush. FOCUSED will bring a diverse group of photojournalists from across the world together one frame at a time towards a common goal: to rely more on our senses than technology.


One roll of film will hold thousands of miles of travel with photo subjects as diverse as the areas they are sent. Frame by frame, the viewer will get a glimpse of the thought process behind making one singular, thoughtful image.


The Project


Five fully manual 35mm cameras will be pre-loaded with a single roll of film and packed into five separate camera bags. The bags will be shipped overnight across the world from one photojournalist to the next - one in a small town in the middle of the U.S., another among relief efforts in a natural disaster zone, or working the White House press pool. Each photojournalist will get only one click of the shutter.


Just one click.


Photojournalists will document their photos not only on film, but in hand-written journal entries with quotes and technical specs from each situation. Journal entries will be scanned and published alongside the images on the website along with any future gallery showings and publications.


All cameras, film canisters, and notebooks will be retained as a historical record of the project and be used in future gallery showings and print publications.


The Benefit


This is an unprecedented opportunity for hundreds of photojournalists to work together. In addition, all of the money raised through unused donations, print sales, book sales, etc., will go to fund youth photography programs across the globe.  FOCUSED has partnered with Critical Exposure in Washington DC, The AjA Project in San Diego, Through the Eyes of Hope in Rwanda, and Fundacion Ph15 in Argentina to help build their wonderful programs teaching photography to underprivileged youth.


Requirements


Gear:


(5) 35mm fully manual vintage rangefinder or SLR camera bodies

(5) 35mm f/2 or similar manual focus lenses

(5) vintage wide camera straps 

(1) brick of ISO 200 35mm film

(5) hard cases for shipment

(5) notebooks for journal entries


Services: 


A pre-paid carrier account for overnight shipping of cameras 

Printing costs of promo materials


Future expenses: 


Printing/framing for gallery show 

Travel costs for promotion of project

Book publication costs


The Future


After the journey of these cameras is complete, hundreds of photos will be curated into gallery showings, limited edition print sales, and a website to archive the project. Ultimately, the project will be marketed as a book sold worldwide to benefit the organizations keeping the foundation of photojournalism thriving.


Contact


For more information regarding the project:


Chip Litherland • Director • 941.321.7167 • chip@focusedproject.org 


http://www.focusedproject.org

story:
What is NEMOART?

"NEMOART : 3D Modeling + Rendering + Compositing"

Today, many people share their daily lives and pictures on SNS with others. Most of those pictures are taken by their smartphones instead of real cameras. In addition, people give digital filter effects to the photos. They also purchase or make our own labels to add it. Thanks to the development of smartphones and widely used SNS, everything became possible and easy. Everything began from the human desire to express ourselves. In near future, the technology that helps to express oneself in better way will take part in our lives for certain.

Q : What will be “the Next Generation” photo editing that we desire?
A : We already have gone through the revolution of Computer Graphics (CG) in the movies, games, architecture, and so forth. CG brought us the satisfaction of “virtual reality”.   

Q : What makes the CG possible in the movie? And why can’t we achieve it easily?
A : The answer lies within the 3D modeling, image compositing, and rendering technology. These bring the realism into the movie screen. However, It is very difficult for the average users to utilize it, because the 3D modeling isn't easy to learn and intuitive to use. Moreover, Image compositing and rendering tasks are expensive to perform and to operate. 

So, that’s why NEMOART is here for us.
NEMOART provide the photorealism to your precious photos. You only need to put the 3D model formulated by cubes and make one simple click. Then, everything is fully responsible to NEMOART rendering cloud service.

Q : What kind of 3D cubes can we put into the photos?
A : You can use 3D cubes made by other users or experts, or you may make one on your own. All the steps are as easy as playing with ‘LEGO’ blocks.

NEMOART is the first service that provides modeling, compositing, and rendering with one’s smartphone at once. It also has a meaning of next-generation in editing photos. 

NEMOART is the first project of “BARI”. We imagine the virtual reality in the computer environment like Matrix. For such reason, we study and prepare various technologies other than NEMOART.
We look forward to have your kind attention and contribution to our first service, NEMOART.

 

How does it work?

NEMOART can formulate model and scene, and then it can process through Rendering Cloud Service.

  

Photography rendered by NEMOART

NEMOART creates all the things you can imagine: animals, cartoon characters, geography, things, effects, signature and even your avatar. And, the NEMOART’s rendering can give breath to a new life into your 3D creation. Furthermore, your 3D creation can be alive in your photo. Followings are simple examples that show how you can create realistic images. 

 

Photorealistic effect 

As above gallery samples have shown, NEMOART’ rendering makes your 3D creation into reality. Using several materials such as glass, plastic, and mirror, your 3D creation seems to be genuine with proper exposure. This is one of the most powerful weapons in NEMOART. NEMOART generates natural light as if your 3D creation is originally in the photo. Therefore, you just put your own 3D creation into photo in order to make a natural image.

Your 3D creation is not a simple 2D emoticon anymore. It is reusable and recreative in various dimensions and in different spaces. These works are attributed to the following effects. In other words, it means that your 3D creation can be set in any position, and it can be adjusted to any sizes according to your photo composition. If it is created on your hand, it can be free anywhere. 

 

Realistic material

NEMOART supports several materials, which means that you can assign different materials to different cubes. Even though you make the same figure model, the rendering images depend on the materials which you choose. Your 3D model can be air, glass, metal and so on. It can also be light as well.

 

Natural light

In real life, the same object looks different depends on where it is. If the object is under the hot sun, it seems to be vivid. On the other hand, the object is under the candlelight, it seems to be dim. NEMOART also provides the natural light based on the light source of your photo. Therefore, the same model can be appeared differently depending on the photo that you use. 

 

Reflection effect

If you make a floor based on the reflective materials such as metal or mirror, you can see that another 3D creation of yours can be visualized on the floor with defined reflection. Furthermore, the objects that were originally in your photo also show reflection on the floor as well. This reflection effect makes 3D creation more realistic. 

 

Refraction effect

If you are using glass or air material, you can create refracted effects of your 3D creation so that it can show the back side of it. 

 

Shadow effect

If you use shadow effect in NEMOART, one can finally achieve your 3D creation to perfection. You can make an actual shadow of your 3D creation in your photo. Most people won’t be able to differentiate whether it is real or not.

 

Rendering Evaluation

Generally, the rendering requires a lot of computing resource and rendering time. (Even though NEMOART’s rendering is faster than the others, it also need a considerable amount of time.) Therefore, it is necessary to understand how to render its own 3D creation for creating a nice image. To increase efficiency of the image creation, we provide two levels of service quality: Low Quality and High Quality.  If you select low quality, you can get result quickly but with lesser image quality. On the contrary, if you select high quality, you can get high quality of image with little bit of longer time.

* Low quality(left) vs High quality(right)

If you would to estimate rendering time, you need to consider the elements which have an immediate influence to rendering procedures. Including quality of service, followings are the important elements related to rendering time. 

* The above results are subject to change.

 

User interface

For efficient 3D modeling and rendering, NEMOART consists of 4 scenes. All of the 4 scenes are intimately connected to each other. In each scene, you can see representative examples, make 3D objects, create realistic photos, and share your results. 

  • FAVORITE – main scene which shows typical examples and provides link to other scenes
  • SKETCH – 3D modeling scene which provides drawing tool, space control, and work control
  • RENDER (Compose, Render) – rendering scene which provides composite and render control
  • GALLERY – share scene which provides a SNS service for sharing your result 

 

* NEMOART will be available for iPhone app store.

 

Connect with us

Connect and keep up with modeling, rendering, and compositing technology:

  • http://nemoart.github.com, especially the blog
  • http://twitter.com/bari_nemoart, Twitter handle:@bari_nemoart
  • https://www.facebook.com/bari.nemoart

We'll update you on developments in the NEMOART project and our funding campaign progress. Thanks!

 

 Recommended Campaign

If you get the time, check out our friends at Plesio 3D printing. http://igg.me/at/ples3d/x/2854534
They offer extremely cheap 3D printing 3D printing to print out plastic models of your NEMOART creations!”

story:
ICARUS Connect smartwatch  

ICARUS, based in the technology capital of the Netherlands, Eindhoven, was founded in 2010 and has brought to market a wide range of e-paper based reading devices since, ranging from 6" basic e-readers up to large screen devices for professional use.

Using our thorough knowledge on e-paper screens and experience in bringing to market mobile electronic devices, we are currently developing an e-paper based smartwatch, the ICARUS Connect.

The Connect is paired via Bluetooth with your Android (versions 2.3 and up) or iOS smartphone and allows you to receive notifcations for certain events on your smartphone, as well as specific information that you request.

Features included:

  • E-paper screen, mineral glass
  • caller ID and incoming caller number for phone calls received
  • incoming messages (SMS)
  • weather forecast
  • pedometer (running assistant)
  • music control
  • camera control
  • watch alert when smartphone is out of range
  • backlight (can be switched on for better readability in dark environments)
  • Facebook notifications
  • great battery life (up to 12 days)

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

Advanced and fashionable

The Connect comes with a black TPU rubber band, that is easy to clean and maintain. An additional range of high quality leather watch bands is available to suit your taste.

A range of special editions will be available for the Christmas season.


Investment and perks

The investment

Currently we are in the hand-made samples stage of the product development cycle. Your investment is needed for the phase of preparing for mass production and subsequently the product ramp up. Current planning is that we should start mass production in april in order to deliver the first production batch in June 2014.


In order to finance the above and also pre-finance raw materials procurement we need an investment of $60,000.

What's in it for you?

You are vital in the success of our project and therefor we offer you some amazing perks in 3 different types:

1) Supporter ($10)

Help us in the right direction and you will receive a discount of $20 on the final product (retail value $129). This donation will also bring you eternal fame as your name will be mentioned on our contributor section of our website.

2) Sponsor ($75)

This gets you a $30 discount on each smartwatch, with a maximum of 3 watches.

3) Ambassador ($200)

You will receive a free of charge smartwatch from the first production batch and in addition a $30 discount on the retail price of up to 3 smartwatches. Your watch will also have a special Ambassador print on the bottom of the housing.


Product range

Connect 1

- the original black Connect with black TPU band. Retail price $129.



Connect +

- the original black Connect with black TPU band and an additional high grade leather band in a color of choice. Retail price $149.


We need your support

Developing electronics is a long and costly process. Support us with the Supporter, Sponsor or Ambassador program, and help spread the word for our project.
